blocks.name: diff.crnk.s

df-r1
blocks.content: Define the cumulative hierarchy of sets function, using Takeuti and Zaring's notation ( ` R1 ` ). Starting with the empty set, this function builds up layers of sets where the next layer is the power set of the previous layer (and the union of previous layers when the argument is a limit ordinal). Using the Axiom of Regularity, we can show that any set whatsoever belongs to one of the layers of this hierarchy (see ~ tz9.13 ). Our definition expresses Definition 9.9 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 76 in a closed form, from which we derive the recursive definition as theorems ~ r10 , ~ r1suc , and ~ r1lim . Theorem ~ r1val1 shows a recursive definition that works for all values, and theorems ~ r1val2 and ~ r1val3 show the value expressed in terms of rank. Other notations for this function are _R_ with the argument as a subscript (Equation 3.1 of [BellMachover] p. 477), ` _V ` with a subscript (Definition of [Enderton] p. 202), _M_ with a subscript (Definition 15.19 of [Monk1] p. 113), the capital Greek letter psi (Definition of [Mendelson] p. 281), and bold-face R (Definition 2.1 of [Kunen] p. 95). (Contributed by NM, 2-Sep-2003.)

blocks.name: df-rank
blocks.content: Define the rank function. See ~ rankval , ~ rankval2 , ~ rankval3 , or ~ rankval4 its value. The rank is a kind of "inverse" of the cumulative hierarchy of sets function ` R1 ` : given a set, it returns an ordinal number telling us the smallest layer of the hierarchy to which the set belongs. Based on Definition 9.14 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 79. Theorem ~ rankid illustrates the "inverse" concept. Another nice theorem showing the relationship is ~ rankr1a . (Contributed by NM, 11-Oct-2003.)

blocks.name: r1funlim
blocks.content: The cumulative hierarchy of sets function is a function on a limit ordinal. (This weak form of ~ r1fnon avoids ~ ax-rep .) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Nov-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm r1funlim() {
  |- wa(wfun(cr1), wlim(cdm(cr1)))
} = {
  pm3.2i(wfun(cr1), wlim(cdm(cr1)))
  mpbir(wfun(cr1), wfun(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, cpw(cv(hs0))), emptycls)))
  rdgfun(cmpt(hs0, universe, cpw(cv(hs0))), emptycls)
  funeqi(cr1, crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, cpw(cv(hs0))), emptycls))
  mpbir(wlim(cdm(cr1)), wlim(cdm(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, cpw(cv(hs0))), emptycls))))
  rdgdmlim(cmpt(hs0, universe, cpw(cv(hs0))), emptycls)
  ax-mp(wb(wlim(cdm(cr1)), wlim(cdm(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, cpw(cv(hs0))), emptycls)))), wceq(cdm(cr1), cdm(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, cpw(cv(hs0))), emptycls))))
  dmeqi(cr1, crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, cpw(cv(hs0))), emptycls))
  df-r1(hs0)
  limeq(cdm(cr1), cdm(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, cpw(cv(hs0))), emptycls)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm r1funlim() {
  ⊢ (Fun(R1)∧ Lim(dom(R1)))
} = {
  pm3.2i(Fun(R1), Lim(dom(R1)))
  mpbir(Fun(R1), Fun(rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ P(hs0)), ∅)))
  rdgfun((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ P(hs0)), emptycls)
  funeqi(cr1, rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ P(hs0)), ∅))
  mpbir(Lim(dom(R1)), Lim(dom(rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ P(hs0)), ∅))))
  rdgdmlim((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ P(hs0)), emptycls)
  ax-mp((Lim(dom(R1))↔ Lim(dom(rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ P(hs0)), ∅)))), dom(R1)= dom(rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ P(hs0)), ∅)))
  dmeqi(cr1, rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ P(hs0)), ∅))
  df-r1(hs0)
  limeq(dom(R1), dom(rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ P(hs0)), ∅)))
}

blocks.name: r1sucg
blocks.content: Value of the cumulative hierarchy of sets function at a successor ordinal. Part of Definition 9.9 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 76. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Nov-2014.)

thm r1sucg(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cdm(cr1)), wceq(cfv(cr1, csuc(c0)), cpw(cfv(cr1, c0))))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(cfv(cr1, csuc(c0)), cpw(cfv(cr1, c0)), cfv(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, cpw(cv(hs0))), emptycls), csuc(c0)), cfv(cmpt(hs0, universe, cpw(cv(hs0))), cfv(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, cpw(cv(hs0))), emptycls), c0)), wcel(c0, cdm(cr1)))
  eleq2s(c0, cdm(cr1), cdm(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, cpw(cv(hs0))), emptycls)), wceq(cfv(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, cpw(cv(hs0))), emptycls), csuc(c0)), cfv(cmpt(hs0, universe, cpw(cv(hs0))), cfv(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, cpw(cv(hs0))), emptycls), c0))))
  rdgsucg(c0, cmpt(hs0, universe, cpw(cv(hs0))), emptycls)
  dmeqi(cr1, crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, cpw(cv(hs0))), emptycls))
  fveq1i(cr1, csuc(c0), crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, cpw(cv(hs0))), emptycls))
  eqtr3i(cpw(cfv(cr1, c0)), cfv(cmpt(hs0, universe, cpw(cv(hs0))), cfv(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, cpw(cv(hs0))), emptycls), c0)), cfv(cmpt(hs0, universe, cpw(cv(hs0))), cfv(cr1, c0)))
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(cmpt(hs0, universe, cpw(cv(hs0))), cfv(cr1, c0)), cpw(cfv(cr1, c0))), wcel(cfv(cr1, c0), universe))
  fvmpt(hs0, cfv(cr1, c0), universe, cmpt(hs0, universe, cpw(cv(hs0))), cpw(cfv(cr1, c0)), cpw(cv(hs0)))
  pweq(cv(hs0), cfv(cr1, c0))
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, universe, cpw(cv(hs0))))
  pwex(cfv(cr1, c0))
  fvex(cr1, c0)
  fveq2i(cmpt(hs0, universe, cpw(cv(hs0))), cfv(cr1, c0), cfv(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, cpw(cv(hs0))), emptycls), c0))
  fveq1i(cr1, c0, crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, cpw(cv(hs0))), emptycls))
  df-r1(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cr1, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(cpw(cfv(cr1, c0)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm r1sucg(class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ dom(R1)→(R1 ` suc(c0))= P((R1 ` c0)))
} = {
  3eqtr4g((R1 ` suc(c0)), P((R1 ` c0)), (rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ P(hs0)), ∅)` suc(c0)), ((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ P(hs0))`(rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ P(hs0)), ∅)` c0)), c0 ∈ dom(R1))
  eleq2s(c0, dom(R1), dom(rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ P(hs0)), ∅)), (rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ P(hs0)), ∅)` suc(c0))=((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ P(hs0))`(rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ P(hs0)), ∅)` c0)))
  rdgsucg(c0, (hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ P(hs0)), emptycls)
  dmeqi(cr1, rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ P(hs0)), ∅))
  fveq1i(cr1, suc(c0), rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ P(hs0)), ∅))
  eqtr3i(P((R1 ` c0)), ((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ P(hs0))`(rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ P(hs0)), ∅)` c0)), ((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ P(hs0))`(R1 ` c0)))
  ax-mp(((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ P(hs0))`(R1 ` c0))= P((R1 ` c0)), (R1 ` c0)∈ 𝕌)
  fvmpt(hs0, (R1 ` c0), universe, (hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ P(hs0)), P((R1 ` c0)), P(hs0))
  pweq(hs0, (R1 ` c0))
  eqid((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ P(hs0)))
  pwex((R1 ` c0))
  fvex(cr1, c0)
  fveq2i((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ P(hs0)), (R1 ` c0), (rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ P(hs0)), ∅)` c0))
  fveq1i(cr1, c0, rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ P(hs0)), ∅))
  df-r1(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c((R1 ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(P((R1 ` c0)))
}

blocks.name: r1limg
blocks.content: Value of the cumulative hierarchy of sets function at a limit ordinal. Part of Definition 9.9 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 76. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Nov-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm r1limg(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cdm(cr1)), wlim(c0)), wceq(cfv(cr1, c0), ciun(s0, c0, cfv(cr1, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  3eqtr4g(cfv(cr1, c0), ciun(s0, c0, cfv(cr1, cv(s0))), cfv(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, cpw(cv(hs0))), emptycls), c0), cuni(cima(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, cpw(cv(hs0))), emptycls), c0)), wa(wcel(c0, cdm(cr1)), wlim(c0)))
  sylanb(wcel(c0, cdm(cr1)), wlim(c0), wceq(cfv(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, cpw(cv(hs0))), emptycls), c0), cuni(cima(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, cpw(cv(hs0))), emptycls), c0))), wcel(c0, cdm(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, cpw(cv(hs0))), emptycls))))
  eleq2i(c0, cdm(cr1), cdm(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, cpw(cv(hs0))), emptycls)))
  dmeqi(cr1, crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, cpw(cv(hs0))), emptycls))
  rdglimg(c0, cmpt(hs0, universe, cpw(cv(hs0))), emptycls)
  fveq1i(cr1, c0, crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, cpw(cv(hs0))), emptycls))
  eqtri(ciun(s0, c0, cfv(cr1, cv(s0))), cuni(cima(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, cpw(cv(hs0))), emptycls), c0)), cuni(cima(cr1, c0)))
  ax-mp(wceq(ciun(s0, c0, cfv(cr1, cv(s0))), cuni(cima(cr1, c0))), wfun(cr1))
  simpli(wfun(cr1), wlim(cdm(cr1)))
  r1funlim()
  funiunfv(s0, cr1, c0)
  unieqi(cima(cr1, c0), cima(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, cpw(cv(hs0))), emptycls), c0))
  imaeq1i(cr1, c0, crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, cpw(cv(hs0))), emptycls))
  df-r1(hs0)
  diff.cr1.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm r1limg(setvar s0, class c0) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ dom(R1)∧ Lim(c0))→(R1 ` c0)= ⋃(s0 ∈ c0,(R1 ` s0)))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  3eqtr4g((R1 ` c0), ⋃(s0 ∈ c0,(R1 ` s0)), (rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ P(hs0)), ∅)` c0), ⋃(rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ P(hs0)), ∅)" c0), (c0 ∈ dom(R1)∧ Lim(c0)))
  sylanb(c0 ∈ dom(R1), Lim(c0), (rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ P(hs0)), ∅)` c0)= ⋃(rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ P(hs0)), ∅)" c0), c0 ∈ dom(rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ P(hs0)), ∅)))
  eleq2i(c0, dom(R1), dom(rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ P(hs0)), ∅)))
  dmeqi(cr1, rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ P(hs0)), ∅))
  rdglimg(c0, (hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ P(hs0)), emptycls)
  fveq1i(cr1, c0, rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ P(hs0)), ∅))
  eqtri(⋃(s0 ∈ c0,(R1 ` s0)), ⋃(rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ P(hs0)), ∅)" c0), ⋃(R1 " c0))
  ax-mp(⋃(s0 ∈ c0,(R1 ` s0))= ⋃(R1 " c0), Fun(R1))
  simpli(Fun(R1), Lim(dom(R1)))
  r1funlim()
  funiunfv(s0, cr1, c0)
  unieqi((R1 " c0), (rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ P(hs0)), ∅)" c0))
  imaeq1i(cr1, c0, rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ P(hs0)), ∅))
  df-r1(hs0)
  diff.cr1.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: r1fin
blocks.content: The first ` _om ` levels of the cumulative hierarchy are all finite. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-May-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm r1fin(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, com), wcel(cfv(cr1, c0), cfn))
} = {
  finds(hs0, hs1, c0, wcel(cfv(cr1, c0), cfn), wcel(cfv(cr1, cv(hs0)), cfn), wcel(cfv(cr1, emptycls), cfn), wcel(cfv(cr1, cv(hs1)), cfn), wcel(cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs1))), cfn))
  eleq1d(cfv(cr1, cv(hs0)), cfn, cfv(cr1, emptycls), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), emptycls, cr1)
  eleq1d(cfv(cr1, cv(hs0)), cfn, cfv(cr1, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), cr1)
  eleq1d(cfv(cr1, cv(hs0)), cfn, cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(hs1))))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(hs1)), cr1)
  eleq1d(cfv(cr1, cv(hs0)), cfn, cfv(cr1, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cr1)
  eqeltri(cfv(cr1, emptycls), cfn, emptycls)
  r10()
  0fin()
  biimpd(wcel(cv(hs1), com), wcel(cfv(cr1, cv(hs1)), cfn), wcel(cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs1))), cfn))
  syl6rbbr(wcel(cv(hs1), com), wcel(cfv(cr1, cv(hs1)), cfn), wcel(cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs1))), cfn), wcel(cpw(cfv(cr1, cv(hs1))), cfn))
  eleq1d(cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs1))), cfn, cpw(cfv(cr1, cv(hs1))), wcel(cv(hs1), com))
  syl(wcel(cv(hs1), com), wceq(cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs1))), cpw(cfv(cr1, cv(hs1)))), wcel(cv(hs1), cdm(cr1)))
  sseli(cv(hs1), com, cdm(cr1))
  ax-mp(wss(com, cdm(cr1)), wlim(cdm(cr1)))
  simpri(wlim(cdm(cr1)), wfun(cr1))
  r1funlim()
  limomss(cdm(cr1))
  r1sucg(cv(hs1))
  pwfi(cfv(cr1, cv(hs1)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cfv(cr1, c0), cfn))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cfv(cr1, emptycls), cfn))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cfv(cr1, cv(hs1)), cfn))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs1))), cfn))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(cfv(cr1, cv(hs0)), cfn))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm r1fin(class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ _om →(R1 ` c0)∈ Fin)
} = {
  finds(hs0, hs1, c0, (R1 ` c0)∈ Fin, (R1 ` hs0)∈ Fin, (R1 ` ∅)∈ Fin, (R1 ` hs1)∈ Fin, (R1 ` suc(hs1))∈ Fin)
  eleq1d((R1 ` hs0), cfn, (R1 ` ∅), hs0 = ∅)
  fveq2(hs0, emptycls, cr1)
  eleq1d((R1 ` hs0), cfn, (R1 ` hs1), hs0 = hs1)
  fveq2(hs0, hs1, cr1)
  eleq1d((R1 ` hs0), cfn, (R1 ` suc(hs1)), hs0 = suc(hs1))
  fveq2(hs0, suc(hs1), cr1)
  eleq1d((R1 ` hs0), cfn, (R1 ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cr1)
  eqeltri((R1 ` ∅), cfn, emptycls)
  r10()
  0fin()
  biimpd(hs1 ∈ _om, (R1 ` hs1)∈ Fin, (R1 ` suc(hs1))∈ Fin)
  syl6rbbr(hs1 ∈ _om, (R1 ` hs1)∈ Fin, (R1 ` suc(hs1))∈ Fin, P((R1 ` hs1))∈ Fin)
  eleq1d((R1 ` suc(hs1)), cfn, P((R1 ` hs1)), hs1 ∈ _om)
  syl(hs1 ∈ _om, (R1 ` suc(hs1))= P((R1 ` hs1)), hs1 ∈ dom(R1))
  sseli(hs1, com, dom(R1))
  ax-mp(_om ⊆ dom(R1), Lim(dom(R1)))
  simpri(Lim(dom(R1)), Fun(R1))
  r1funlim()
  limomss(dom(R1))
  r1sucg(hs1)
  pwfi((R1 ` hs1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w((R1 ` c0)∈ Fin)
  diff.hs0.w((R1 ` ∅)∈ Fin)
  diff.hs0.w((R1 ` hs1)∈ Fin)
  diff.hs0.w((R1 ` suc(hs1))∈ Fin)
  diff.hs1.w((R1 ` hs0)∈ Fin)
}

blocks.name: r1sdom
blocks.content: Each stage in the cumulative hierarchy is strictly larger than the last. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Apr-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm r1sdom(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, c0)), wbr(cfv(cr1, c1), csdm, cfv(cr1, c0)))
} = {
  imp(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, c0), wbr(cfv(cr1, c1), csdm, cfv(cr1, c0)))
  tfinds(hs0, hs1, c0, wi(wcel(c1, c0), wbr(cfv(cr1, c1), csdm, cfv(cr1, c0))), wi(wcel(c1, cv(hs0)), wbr(cfv(cr1, c1), csdm, cfv(cr1, cv(hs0)))), wi(wcel(c1, emptycls), wbr(cfv(cr1, c1), csdm, cfv(cr1, emptycls))), wi(wcel(c1, cv(hs1)), wbr(cfv(cr1, c1), csdm, cfv(cr1, cv(hs1)))), wi(wcel(c1, csuc(cv(hs1))), wbr(cfv(cr1, c1), csdm, cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs1))))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls), wcel(c1, cv(hs0)), wbr(cfv(cr1, c1), csdm, cfv(cr1, cv(hs0))), wcel(c1, emptycls), wbr(cfv(cr1, c1), csdm, cfv(cr1, emptycls)))
  eleq2(cv(hs0), emptycls, c1)
  breq2d(cfv(cr1, c1), csdm, cfv(cr1, cv(hs0)), cfv(cr1, emptycls), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), emptycls, cr1)
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(c1, cv(hs0)), wbr(cfv(cr1, c1), csdm, cfv(cr1, cv(hs0))), wcel(c1, cv(hs1)), wbr(cfv(cr1, c1), csdm, cfv(cr1, cv(hs1))))
  eleq2(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c1)
  breq2d(cfv(cr1, c1), csdm, cfv(cr1, cv(hs0)), cfv(cr1, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), cr1)
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(hs1))), wcel(c1, cv(hs0)), wbr(cfv(cr1, c1), csdm, cfv(cr1, cv(hs0))), wcel(c1, csuc(cv(hs1))), wbr(cfv(cr1, c1), csdm, cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs1)))))
  eleq2(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(hs1)), c1)
  breq2d(cfv(cr1, c1), csdm, cfv(cr1, cv(hs0)), cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(hs1))))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(hs1)), cr1)
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(c1, cv(hs0)), wbr(cfv(cr1, c1), csdm, cfv(cr1, cv(hs0))), wcel(c1, c0), wbr(cfv(cr1, c1), csdm, cfv(cr1, c0)))
  eleq2(cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  breq2d(cfv(cr1, c1), csdm, cfv(cr1, cv(hs0)), cfv(cr1, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cr1)
  pm2.21i(wcel(c1, emptycls), wbr(cfv(cr1, c1), csdm, cfv(cr1, emptycls)))
  noel(c1)

thm r1sdom(class c0, class c1) {

} = {
  imp(c0 ∈ On, c1 ∈ c0, (R1 ` c1)[≺](R1 ` c0))
  tfinds(hs0, hs1, c0, (c1 ∈ c0 →(R1 ` c1)[≺](R1 ` c0)), (c1 ∈ hs0 →(R1 ` c1)[≺](R1 ` hs0)), (c1 ∈ ∅ →(R1 ` c1)[≺](R1 ` ∅)), (c1 ∈ hs1 →(R1 ` c1)[≺](R1 ` hs1)), (c1 ∈ suc(hs1)→(R1 ` c1)[≺](R1 ` suc(hs1))))
  imbi12d(hs0 = ∅, c1 ∈ hs0, (R1 ` c1)[≺](R1 ` hs0), c1 ∈ ∅, (R1 ` c1)[≺](R1 ` ∅))
  eleq2(hs0, emptycls, c1)
  breq2d((R1 ` c1), csdm, (R1 ` hs0), (R1 ` ∅), hs0 = ∅)
  fveq2(hs0, emptycls, cr1)
  imbi12d(hs0 = hs1, c1 ∈ hs0, (R1 ` c1)[≺](R1 ` hs0), c1 ∈ hs1, (R1 ` c1)[≺](R1 ` hs1))
  eleq2(hs0, hs1, c1)
  breq2d((R1 ` c1), csdm, (R1 ` hs0), (R1 ` hs1), hs0 = hs1)
  fveq2(hs0, hs1, cr1)
  imbi12d(hs0 = suc(hs1), c1 ∈ hs0, (R1 ` c1)[≺](R1 ` hs0), c1 ∈ suc(hs1), (R1 ` c1)[≺](R1 ` suc(hs1)))
  eleq2(hs0, suc(hs1), c1)
  breq2d((R1 ` c1), csdm, (R1 ` hs0), (R1 ` suc(hs1)), hs0 = suc(hs1))
  fveq2(hs0, suc(hs1), cr1)
  imbi12d(hs0 = c0, c1 ∈ hs0, (R1 ` c1)[≺](R1 ` hs0), c1 ∈ c0, (R1 ` c1)[≺](R1 ` c0))
  eleq2(hs0, c0, c1)
  breq2d((R1 ` c1), csdm, (R1 ` hs0), (R1 ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cr1)
  pm2.21i(c1 ∈ ∅, (R1 ` c1)[≺](R1 ` ∅))
  noel(c1)
  com3r(hs1 ∈ On, (c1 ∈ hs1 →(R1 ` c1)[≺](R1 ` hs1)), c1 ∈ suc(hs1), (R1 ` c1)[≺](R1 ` suc(hs1)))
  syl5((c1 ∈ hs1 →(R1 ` c1)[≺](R1 ` hs1)), c1 ∈ suc(hs1), (hs1 ∈ On →(R1 ` c1)[≺](R1 ` suc(hs1))), (c1 ∈ hs1 ∨ c1 = hs1))
  elsuci(c1, hs1)
  jaod((c1 ∈ hs1 →(R1 ` c1)[≺](R1 ` hs1)), c1 ∈ hs1, c1 = hs1, (hs1 ∈ On →(R1 ` c1)[≺](R1 ` suc(hs1))))
  imim2i(c1 ∈ hs1, (R1 ` c1)[≺](R1 ` hs1), (hs1 ∈ On →(R1 ` c1)[≺](R1 ` suc(hs1))))
  syl11((R1 ` c1)[≺](R1 ` hs1), hs1 ∈ On, (R1 ` c1)[≺](R1 ` suc(hs1)), (R1 ` hs1)[≺](R1 ` suc(hs1)))
  expcom((R1 ` hs1)[≺](R1 ` suc(hs1)), (R1 ` c1)[≺](R1 ` hs1), (R1 ` c1)[≺](R1 ` suc(hs1)))
  sdomtr((R1 ` c1), (R1 ` hs1), (R1 ` suc(hs1)))
  a1i((c1 ∈ hs1 →(R1 ` c1)[≺](R1 ` hs1)), (c1 = hs1 →(hs1 ∈ On →(R1 ` c1)[≺](R1 ` suc(hs1)))))
  syl5ibr(c1 = hs1, hs1 ∈ On, (R1 ` c1)[≺](R1 ` suc(hs1)), (R1 ` hs1)[≺](R1 ` suc(hs1)))
  syl5breqr((R1 ` hs1), csdm, (R1 ` suc(hs1)), P((R1 ` hs1)), hs1 ∈ On)
  canth2((R1 ` hs1))
  fvex(cr1, hs1)
  r1suc(hs1)
  breq1d((R1 ` c1), csdm, (R1 ` suc(hs1)), (R1 ` hs1), c1 = hs1)
  fveq2(c1, hs1, cr1)
  com23(Lim(hs0), ∀(hs1 ∈ hs0,(c1 ∈ hs1 →(R1 ` c1)[≺](R1 ` hs1))), c1 ∈ hs0, (R1 ` c1)[≺](R1 ` hs0))

  syl5(Lim(hs0), (∀(hs1 ∈ hs0,(c1 ∈ hs1 →(R1 ` c1)[≺](R1 ` hs1)))∧ ∃(hs1 ∈ hs0, c1 ∈ hs1)), (R1 ` c1)[≺](R1 ` hs0), ∃(hs1 ∈ hs0,((c1 ∈ hs1 →(R1 ` c1)[≺](R1 ` hs1))∧ c1 ∈ hs1)))
  r19.29(hs1, hs0, (c1 ∈ hs1 →(R1 ` c1)[≺](R1 ` hs1)), c1 ∈ hs1)

  mpsylsyld(Lim(hs0), hs1 ∈ hs0, (R1 ` hs1)[≼](R1 ` hs0), (R1 ` hs0)∈ 𝕌, (R1 ` hs1)⊆(R1 ` hs0))
  fvex(cr1, hs0)
  syl5ibr(Lim(hs0), hs1 ∈ hs0, (R1 ` hs1)⊆(R1 ` hs0), (R1 ` hs1)⊆ ⋃(hs1 ∈ hs0,(R1 ` hs1)))
  ssiun2(hs1, hs0, (R1 ` hs1))
  sseq2d((R1 ` hs1), (R1 ` hs0), ⋃(hs1 ∈ hs0,(R1 ` hs1)), Lim(hs0))
  mpan(Lim(hs0), (R1 ` hs0)= ⋃(hs1 ∈ hs0,(R1 ` hs1)), hs0 ∈ 𝕌)
  vex(hs0)
  r1lim(hs1, hs0, universe)
  ssdomg((R1 ` hs0), universe, (R1 ` hs1))
  syl5((R1 ` hs1)[≼](R1 ` hs0), ((c1 ∈ hs1 →(R1 ` c1)[≺](R1 ` hs1))∧ c1 ∈ hs1), (R1 ` c1)[≺](R1 ` hs0), (R1 ` c1)[≺](R1 ` hs1))
  imp((c1 ∈ hs1 →(R1 ` c1)[≺](R1 ` hs1)), c1 ∈ hs1, (R1 ` c1)[≺](R1 ` hs1))
  id((c1 ∈ hs1 →(R1 ` c1)[≺](R1 ` hs1)))
  expcom((R1 ` hs1)[≼](R1 ` hs0), (R1 ` c1)[≺](R1 ` hs1), (R1 ` c1)[≺](R1 ` hs0))
  sdomdomtr((R1 ` c1), (R1 ` hs1), (R1 ` hs0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w((c1 ∈ c0 →(R1 ` c1)[≺](R1 ` c0)))

  diff.hs1.w((c1 ∈ hs0 →(R1 ` c1)[≺](R1 ` hs0)))

  diff.hs1.w(Lim(hs0))
  diff.hs1.w((R1 ` c1)[≺](R1 ` hs0))

thm r111() {
  ⊢ (R1 : On ↣ 𝕌)
} = {
  mpbir2an((R1 : On ↣ 𝕌), (R1 : On → 𝕌), ∀(hs0 ∈ On, ∀(hs1 ∈ On,((R1 ` hs0)=(R1 ` hs1)→ hs0 = hs1))))
  mpbi((R1 : On → 𝕌), R1[Fn]On)
  r1fnon()
  dffn2(cr1, con0)

thm r1tr(class c0) {
  ⊢ Tr((R1 ` c0))
} = {
  pm2.61i(Tr((R1 ` c0)), c0 ∈ dom(R1))
  syl(c0 ∈ dom(R1), Tr((R1 ` c0)), c0 ∈ On)
  sseli(c0, dom(R1), con0)

  limord(dom(R1))

  tfinds(hs0, hs1, c0, Tr((R1 ` c0)), Tr((R1 ` hs0)), Tr(∅), Tr((R1 ` hs1)), Tr((R1 ` suc(hs1))))
  syl(hs0 = ∅, (Tr((R1 ` hs0))↔ Tr(∅)), (R1 ` hs0)= ∅)
  syl6eq((R1 ` hs0), emptycls, (R1 ` ∅), hs0 = ∅)
  fveq2(hs0, emptycls, cr1)
  r10()
  syl(hs0 = hs1, (Tr((R1 ` hs0))↔ Tr((R1 ` hs1))), (R1 ` hs0)=(R1 ` hs1))
  fveq2(hs0, hs1, cr1)
  treq((R1 ` hs0), (R1 ` hs1))
  syl(hs0 = suc(hs1), (Tr((R1 ` hs0))↔ Tr((R1 ` suc(hs1)))), (R1 ` hs0)=(R1 ` suc(hs1)))
  fveq2(hs0, suc(hs1), cr1)
  treq((R1 ` hs0), (R1 ` suc(hs1)))
  syl(hs0 = c0, (Tr((R1 ` hs0))↔ Tr((R1 ` c0))), (R1 ` hs0)=(R1 ` c0))
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cr1)
  treq((R1 ` hs0), (R1 ` c0))
  ex(hs1 ∈ On, Tr((R1 ` hs1)), Tr((R1 ` suc(hs1))))
  pm2.61d1((hs1 ∈ On ∧ Tr((R1 ` hs1))), Tr((R1 ` suc(hs1))), suc(hs1)∈ dom(R1))
  syl5bir((hs1 ∈ On ∧ Tr((R1 ` hs1))), suc(hs1)∈ dom(R1), Tr((R1 ` suc(hs1))), hs1 ∈ dom(R1))
  ax-mp((hs1 ∈ dom(R1)↔ suc(hs1)∈ dom(R1)), Lim(dom(R1)))
  simpri(Lim(dom(R1)), Fun(R1))
  r1funlim()
  limsuc(dom(R1), hs1)
  syl5ibrcom((hs1 ∈ On ∧ Tr((R1 ` hs1))), hs1 ∈ dom(R1), Tr((R1 ` suc(hs1))), Tr(P((R1 ` hs1))))
  sylib((hs1 ∈ On ∧ Tr((R1 ` hs1))), Tr(P((R1 ` hs1))), Tr((R1 ` hs1)))
  simpr(hs1 ∈ On, Tr((R1 ` hs1)))
  pwtr((R1 ` hs1))
  syl(hs1 ∈ dom(R1), (Tr((R1 ` suc(hs1)))↔ Tr(P((R1 ` hs1)))), (R1 ` suc(hs1))= P((R1 ` hs1)))
  r1sucg(hs1)
  treq((R1 ` suc(hs1)), P((R1 ` hs1)))
  mpbiri(¬ suc(hs1)∈ dom(R1), Tr((R1 ` suc(hs1))), Tr(∅))
  syl(¬ suc(hs1)∈ dom(R1), (Tr((R1 ` suc(hs1)))↔ Tr(∅)), (R1 ` suc(hs1))= ∅)
  ndmfv(suc(hs1), cr1)
  treq((R1 ` suc(hs1)), emptycls)
  ex(Lim(hs0), ∀(hs1 ∈ hs0, Tr((R1 ` hs1))), Tr((R1 ` hs0)))
  pm2.61d1((Lim(hs0)∧ ∀(hs1 ∈ hs0, Tr((R1 ` hs1)))), Tr((R1 ` hs0)), hs0 ∈ dom(R1))
  impancom(Lim(hs0), ∀(hs1 ∈ hs0, Tr((R1 ` hs1))), hs0 ∈ dom(R1), Tr((R1 ` hs0)))
  syl5ibr((Lim(hs0)∧ hs0 ∈ dom(R1)), ∀(hs1 ∈ hs0, Tr((R1 ` hs1))), Tr((R1 ` hs0)), Tr(⋃(hs1 ∈ hs0,(R1 ` hs1))))
  triun(hs1, hs0, (R1 ` hs1))
  syl((Lim(hs0)∧ hs0 ∈ dom(R1)), (Tr((R1 ` hs0))↔ Tr(⋃(hs1 ∈ hs0,(R1 ` hs1)))), (R1 ` hs0)= ⋃(hs1 ∈ hs0,(R1 ` hs1)))
  ancoms(Lim(hs0), hs0 ∈ dom(R1), (R1 ` hs0)= ⋃(hs1 ∈ hs0,(R1 ` hs1)))
  r1limg(hs1, hs0)
  treq((R1 ` hs0), ⋃(hs1 ∈ hs0,(R1 ` hs1)))
  mpbiri(¬ hs0 ∈ dom(R1), Tr((R1 ` hs0)), Tr(∅))
  syl(¬ hs0 ∈ dom(R1), (Tr((R1 ` hs0))↔ Tr(∅)), (R1 ` hs0)= ∅)
  ndmfv(hs0, cr1)

blocks.content: Ordering relation for the cumulative hierarchy of sets. Part of Theorem 3.3(i) of [BellMachover] p. 478. (Contributed by NM, 22-Sep-2003.)

blocks.name: r1sssuc
blocks.content: The value of the cumulative hierarchy of sets function is a subset of its value at the successor. JFM CLASSES1 Th. 39. (Contributed by FL, 20-Apr-2011.)

blocks.name: r1pwss
blocks.content: Each set of the cumulative hierarchy is closed under subsets. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Nov-2014.)

  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, c1)), wceq(c1, csuc(cv(hs0)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(cr1)), wcel(csuc(cv(hs0)), cdm(cr1)))

  ad2antlr(wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, c1)), wlim(c1), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, cv(hs0)))), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(csuc(cv(hs0)), c1)))

  limsuc(c1, csuc(cv(hs0)))

  sylibr(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, c1)), wlim(c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, cv(hs0))))), wcel(cpw(c0), cpw(cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs0))))), wss(cpw(c0), cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs0)))))
  sseqtr4d(cpw(c0), cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs0))), cpw(cfv(cr1, cv(hs0))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, c1)), wlim(c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, cv(hs0))))))

thm r1pwss(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈(R1 ` c1)→ P(c0)⊆(R1 ` c1))
} = {
  mpd(c0 ∈(R1 ` c1), P(c0)⊆(R1 ` c1), (c1 = ∅ ∨ ∃(hs0 ∈ On, c1 = suc(hs0))∨(c1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ Lim(c1))))
  sylib(c0 ∈(R1 ` c1), (c1 = ∅ ∨ ∃(hs0 ∈ On, c1 = suc(hs0))∨(c1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ Lim(c1))), c1 ∈ On)
  sseldi(c1, con0, dom(R1), c0 ∈(R1 ` c1))
  ax-mp(dom(R1)⊆ On, Ord(dom(R1)))
  ordsson(dom(R1))
  onzsl(hs0, c1)
  3jaod(c0 ∈(R1 ` c1), c1 = ∅, ∃(hs0 ∈ On, c1 = suc(hs0)), (c1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ Lim(c1)), P(c0)⊆(R1 ` c1))
  pm2.21d(c0 ∈(R1 ` c1), c1 = ∅, P(c0)⊆(R1 ` c1))
  mtoi(c0 ∈(R1 ` c1), c1 = ∅, c0 ∈ ∅)
  noel(c0)
  biimpcd(c0 ∈(R1 ` c1), c1 = ∅, c0 ∈ ∅)
  eleq2d(c0, (R1 ` c1), emptycls, c1 = ∅)
  syl6eq((R1 ` c1), emptycls, (R1 ` ∅), c1 = ∅)
  fveq2(c1, emptycls, cr1)
  r10()
  rexlimdvw(hs0, con0, c0 ∈(R1 ` c1), c1 = suc(hs0), P(c0)⊆(R1 ` c1))
  ex(c0 ∈(R1 ` c1), c1 = suc(hs0), P(c0)⊆(R1 ` c1))
  sseqtr4d(P(c0), (R1 ` c1), P((R1 ` hs0)), (c0 ∈(R1 ` c1)∧ c1 = suc(hs0)))
  syl((c0 ∈(R1 ` c1)∧ c1 = suc(hs0)), P(c0)⊆ P((R1 ` hs0)), c0 ∈ P((R1 ` hs0)))
  eleqtrd(c0, P((R1 ` hs0)), (R1 ` c1), (c0 ∈(R1 ` c1)∧ c1 = suc(hs0)))
  simpl(c0 ∈(R1 ` c1), c1 = suc(hs0))
  sylib(c0 ∈ P((R1 ` hs0)), P(c0)⊆ P((R1 ` hs0)), c0 ⊆(R1 ` hs0))
  elpwi(c0, (R1 ` hs0))
  eqtrd((R1 ` c1), P((R1 ` hs0)), (R1 ` suc(hs0)), (c0 ∈(R1 ` c1)∧ c1 = suc(hs0)))
  fveq2d(cr1, c1, suc(hs0), (c0 ∈(R1 ` c1)∧ c1 = suc(hs0)))
  syl((c0 ∈(R1 ` c1)∧ c1 = suc(hs0)), (R1 ` suc(hs0))= P((R1 ` hs0)), hs0 ∈ dom(R1))
  sylibr((c0 ∈(R1 ` c1)∧ c1 = suc(hs0)), hs0 ∈ dom(R1), suc(hs0)∈ dom(R1))
  eqeltrrd(suc(hs0), dom(R1), c1, (c0 ∈(R1 ` c1)∧ c1 = suc(hs0)))
  simpr(c0 ∈(R1 ` c1), c1 = suc(hs0))
  adantr(c0 ∈(R1 ` c1), c1 = suc(hs0), c1 ∈ dom(R1))
  adantld(c0 ∈(R1 ` c1), c1 ∈ 𝕌, Lim(c1), P(c0)⊆(R1 ` c1))
  ex(c0 ∈(R1 ` c1), Lim(c1), P(c0)⊆(R1 ` c1))
  mpsyl((c0 ∈(R1 ` c1)∧ Lim(c1)), P(c0)⊆(R1 ` c1), Tr((R1 ` c1)), P(c0)∈(R1 ` c1))
  r1tr(c1)
  eleqtrrd(P(c0), (R1 ` c1), ⋃(hs1 ∈ c1,(R1 ` hs1)), (c0 ∈(R1 ` c1)∧ Lim(c1)))
  sylibr((c0 ∈(R1 ` c1)∧ Lim(c1)), P(c0)∈ ⋃(hs1 ∈ c1,(R1 ` hs1)), ∃(hs1 ∈ c1, P(c0)∈(R1 ` hs1)))
  rexlimddv(hs0, c1, (c0 ∈(R1 ` c1)∧ Lim(c1)), ∃(hs1 ∈ c1, P(c0)∈(R1 ` hs1)), c0 ∈(R1 ` hs0))
  sylib((c0 ∈(R1 ` c1)∧ Lim(c1)), ∃(hs0 ∈ c1, c0 ∈(R1 ` hs0)), c0 ∈ ⋃(hs0 ∈ c1,(R1 ` hs0)))
  eleqtrd(c0, ⋃(hs0 ∈ c1,(R1 ` hs0)), (R1 ` c1), (c0 ∈(R1 ` c1)∧ Lim(c1)))
  simpl(c0 ∈(R1 ` c1), Lim(c1))
  sylan(c0 ∈(R1 ` c1), Lim(c1), (R1 ` c1)= ⋃(hs0 ∈ c1,(R1 ` hs0)), c1 ∈ dom(R1))
  r1limg(hs0, c1)
  eliun(hs0, c0, c1, (R1 ` hs0))
  syl2anc(((c0 ∈(R1 ` c1)∧ Lim(c1))∧(hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ c0 ∈(R1 ` hs0))), ∃(hs1 ∈ c1, P(c0)∈(R1 ` hs1)), suc(suc(hs0))∈ c1, P(c0)∈(R1 ` suc(suc(hs0))))
  mpbid(((c0 ∈(R1 ` c1)∧ Lim(c1))∧(hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ c0 ∈(R1 ` hs0))), suc(suc(hs0))∈ c1, suc(hs0)∈ c1)
  mpbid(((c0 ∈(R1 ` c1)∧ Lim(c1))∧(hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ c0 ∈(R1 ` hs0))), suc(hs0)∈ c1, hs0 ∈ c1)
  ad2antlr(c0 ∈(R1 ` c1), Lim(c1), (hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ c0 ∈(R1 ` hs0)), (hs0 ∈ c1 ↔ suc(hs0)∈ c1))
  limsuc(c1, hs0)
  ad2antlr(c0 ∈(R1 ` c1), Lim(c1), (hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ c0 ∈(R1 ` hs0)), (suc(hs0)∈ c1 ↔ suc(suc(hs0))∈ c1))
  limsuc(c1, suc(hs0))
  eleqtrrd(P(c0), (R1 ` suc(suc(hs0))), P((R1 ` suc(hs0))), ((c0 ∈(R1 ` c1)∧ Lim(c1))∧(hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ c0 ∈(R1 ` hs0))))
  sylibr(((c0 ∈(R1 ` c1)∧ Lim(c1))∧(hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ c0 ∈(R1 ` hs0))), P(c0)∈ P((R1 ` suc(hs0))), P(c0)⊆(R1 ` suc(hs0)))
  sseqtr4d(P(c0), (R1 ` suc(hs0)), P((R1 ` hs0)), ((c0 ∈(R1 ` c1)∧ Lim(c1))∧(hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ c0 ∈(R1 ` hs0))))
  sylib(((c0 ∈(R1 ` c1)∧ Lim(c1))∧(hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ c0 ∈(R1 ` hs0))), P(c0)⊆ P((R1 ` hs0)), c0 ⊆(R1 ` hs0))
  mpsyl(((c0 ∈(R1 ` c1)∧ Lim(c1))∧(hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ c0 ∈(R1 ` hs0))), c0 ⊆(R1 ` hs0), Tr((R1 ` hs0)), c0 ∈(R1 ` hs0))
  r1tr(hs0)
  simprr((c0 ∈(R1 ` c1)∧ Lim(c1)), hs0 ∈ c1, c0 ∈(R1 ` hs0))
  trss((R1 ` hs0), c0)
  sspwb(c0, (R1 ` hs0))
  syl(((c0 ∈(R1 ` c1)∧ Lim(c1))∧(hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ c0 ∈(R1 ` hs0))), (R1 ` suc(hs0))= P((R1 ` hs0)), hs0 ∈ dom(R1))
  r1sucg(hs0)
  elpw2(P(c0), (R1 ` suc(hs0)))
  fvex(cr1, suc(hs0))
  syl(((c0 ∈(R1 ` c1)∧ Lim(c1))∧(hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ c0 ∈(R1 ` hs0))), (R1 ` suc(suc(hs0)))= P((R1 ` suc(hs0))), suc(hs0)∈ dom(R1))
  sylib(((c0 ∈(R1 ` c1)∧ Lim(c1))∧(hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ c0 ∈(R1 ` hs0))), suc(hs0)∈ dom(R1), hs0 ∈ dom(R1))
  syl2anc(((c0 ∈(R1 ` c1)∧ Lim(c1))∧(hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ c0 ∈(R1 ` hs0))), hs0 ∈ dom(R1), hs0 ∈ c1, c1 ∈ dom(R1))
  simprl((c0 ∈(R1 ` c1)∧ Lim(c1)), hs0 ∈ c1, c0 ∈(R1 ` hs0))
  ad2antrr(c0 ∈(R1 ` c1), Lim(c1), (hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ c0 ∈(R1 ` hs0)), c1 ∈ dom(R1))
  ax-mp(((hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ c1 ∈ dom(R1))→ hs0 ∈ dom(R1)), Ord(dom(R1)))
  ax-mp(Ord(dom(R1)), Lim(dom(R1)))
  limord(dom(R1))
  ordtr1(dom(R1), hs0, c1)
  ax-mp((hs0 ∈ dom(R1)↔ suc(hs0)∈ dom(R1)), Lim(dom(R1)))
  simpri(Lim(dom(R1)), Fun(R1))

  limsuc(dom(R1), hs0)
  r1sucg(suc(hs0))
  rspcev(hs1, suc(suc(hs0)), c1, P(c0)∈(R1 ` suc(suc(hs0))), P(c0)∈(R1 ` hs1))
  eleq2d(P(c0), (R1 ` hs1), (R1 ` suc(suc(hs0))), hs1 = suc(suc(hs0)))
  fveq2(hs1, suc(suc(hs0)), cr1)
  eliun(hs1, P(c0), c1, (R1 ` hs1))
  sylan(c0 ∈(R1 ` c1), Lim(c1), (R1 ` c1)= ⋃(hs1 ∈ c1,(R1 ` hs1)), c1 ∈ dom(R1))
  elfvdm(c0, cr1, c1)
  r1limg(hs1, c1)
  trss((R1 ` c1), P(c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)

  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.w(P(c0)∈(R1 ` suc(suc(hs0))))
  diff.hs1.c(P(c0))
}

} = {

  mpjao3dan(c0 ∈ dom(R1), (R1 ` c0)⊆ ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, P((R1 ` s0))), c0 = ∅, ∃(s0 ∈ On, c0 = suc(s0)), (c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ Lim(c0)))
  eqsstrd((R1 ` c0), ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, P((R1 ` s0))), emptycls, (c0 ∈ dom(R1)∧ c0 = ∅))

  0ss(⋃(s0 ∈ c0, P((R1 ` s0))))
  imp(c0 ∈ dom(R1), ∃(s0 ∈ On, c0 = suc(s0)), (R1 ` c0)⊆ ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, P((R1 ` s0))))
  rexlimd(s0, con0, c0 ∈ dom(R1), c0 = suc(s0), (R1 ` c0)⊆ ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, P((R1 ` s0))))
  nfv(s0, c0 ∈ dom(R1))
  nfss(s0, (R1 ` c0), ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, P((R1 ` s0))))

  ex(c0 ∈ dom(R1), c0 = suc(s0), (R1 ` c0)⊆ ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, P((R1 ` s0))))
  eqsstrd((R1 ` c0), ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, P((R1 ` s0))), P((R1 ` s0)), (c0 ∈ dom(R1)∧ c0 = suc(s0)))
  eqtrd((R1 ` c0), P((R1 ` s0)), (R1 ` suc(s0)), (c0 ∈ dom(R1)∧ c0 = suc(s0)))
  fveq2d(cr1, c0, suc(s0), (c0 ∈ dom(R1)∧ c0 = suc(s0)))

  sylibr((c0 ∈ dom(R1)∧ c0 = suc(s0)), s0 ∈ dom(R1), suc(s0)∈ dom(R1))
  biimpac(c0 ∈ dom(R1), c0 = suc(s0), suc(s0)∈ dom(R1))
  eleq1(c0, suc(s0), dom(R1))
  syl((c0 ∈ dom(R1)∧ c0 = suc(s0)), P((R1 ` s0))⊆ ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, P((R1 ` s0))), s0 ∈ c0)
  syl5eleqr(s0, c0, suc(s0), (c0 ∈ dom(R1)∧ c0 = suc(s0)))
  sucid(s0)
  vex(s0)
  simpr(c0 ∈ dom(R1), c0 = suc(s0))
  ssiun2(s0, c0, P((R1 ` s0)))
  adantrl(c0 ∈ dom(R1), c0 ∈ 𝕌, Lim(c0), (R1 ` c0)⊆ ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, P((R1 ` s0))))
  eqsstrd((R1 ` c0), ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, P((R1 ` s0))), ⋃(s0 ∈ c0,(R1 ` s0)), (c0 ∈ dom(R1)∧ Lim(c0)))
  r1limg(s0, c0)

  ralrimivw(s0, c0, (c0 ∈ dom(R1)∧ Lim(c0)), (R1 ` s0)⊆ P((R1 ` s0)))

  simpr(c0 ∈ dom(R1), s0 ∈ c0)
  adantr(c0 ∈ dom(R1), s0 ∈ c0, Ord(c0))
  mpan(c0 ∈ dom(R1), Ord(c0), Ord(dom(R1)))
  ordelord(dom(R1), c0)
  ordelsuc(s0, c0, c0)
  syl2anc((c0 ∈ dom(R1)∧ s0 ∈ c0), (suc(s0)⊆ c0 →(R1 ` suc(s0))⊆(R1 ` c0)), suc(s0)∈ dom(R1), c0 ∈ dom(R1))
  sylib((c0 ∈ dom(R1)∧ s0 ∈ c0), suc(s0)∈ dom(R1), s0 ∈ dom(R1))
  ancoms(c0 ∈ dom(R1), s0 ∈ c0, s0 ∈ dom(R1))
  ax-mp(((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ c0 ∈ dom(R1))→ s0 ∈ dom(R1)), Ord(dom(R1)))
  ax-mp(Ord(dom(R1)), Lim(dom(R1)))
  limord(dom(R1))
  ordtr1(dom(R1), s0, c0)
  ax-mp((s0 ∈ dom(R1)↔ suc(s0)∈ dom(R1)), Lim(dom(R1)))
  simpri(Lim(dom(R1)), Fun(R1))
  r1funlim()
  limsuc(dom(R1), s0)
  simpl(c0 ∈ dom(R1), s0 ∈ c0)
  r1ord3g(suc(s0), c0)
  iunss(s0, c0, P((R1 ` s0)), (R1 ` c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cr1, c0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, c0 ∈ dom(R1), Lim(c0))

  diff.cr1.s(s0)
  diff.wlim.s(s0, c0)
}

thm tz9.12lem1(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {

  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  a1ii(wss(cima(c0, c1), con0), wcel(c1, universe))
  a1ii(wss(cima(c0, c1), con0), diffss(s0, s1))
  a1ii(wss(cima(c0, c1), con0), diffsc(s0, c1))
  a1ii(wss(cima(c0, c1), con0), diffsc(s1, c1))
  sstri(cima(c0, c1), con0, crn(c0))
  imassrn(c0, c1)
  eqsstri(crn(c0), con0, cab(hs0, wrex(s0, universe, wceq(cv(hs0), cint(crab(s1, con0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cr1, cv(s1)))))))))

  abssi(hs0, con0, wrex(s0, universe, wceq(cv(hs0), cint(crab(s1, con0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cr1, cv(s1))))))))
  rexlimivw(s0, universe, wceq(cv(hs0), cint(crab(s1, con0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cr1, cv(s1)))))), wcel(cv(hs0), con0))
  eqeltrd(cv(hs0), con0, cint(crab(s1, con0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cr1, cv(s1))))), wceq(cv(hs0), cint(crab(s1, con0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cr1, cv(s1)))))))
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), cint(crab(s1, con0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cr1, cv(s1)))))))
  sylancr(wceq(cv(hs0), cint(crab(s1, con0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cr1, cv(s1)))))), wcel(cint(crab(s1, con0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cr1, cv(s1))))), con0), wss(crab(s1, con0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cr1, cv(s1)))), con0), wne(crab(s1, con0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cr1, cv(s1)))), emptycls))
  ssrab2(s1, con0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cr1, cv(s1))))
  sylibr(wceq(cv(hs0), cint(crab(s1, con0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cr1, cv(s1)))))), wne(crab(s1, con0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cr1, cv(s1)))), emptycls), wcel(cint(crab(s1, con0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cr1, cv(s1))))), universe))
  eqvisset(hs0, cint(crab(s1, con0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cr1, cv(s1))))))
  intex(crab(s1, con0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cr1, cv(s1)))))

thm rankf() {

} = {

  eqtri(dom(rank), ⋃(R1 " On), dom({ < hs0, hs2 > | hs2 = ⋂ { hs1 ∈ On | hs0 ∈(R1 ` suc(hs1))} }))
  dmeqi(crnk, { < hs0, hs2 > | hs2 = ⋂ { hs1 ∈ On | hs0 ∈(R1 ` suc(hs1))} })

  mptv(hs0, hs2, ⋂ { hs1 ∈ On | hs0 ∈(R1 ` suc(hs1))})

  dmopab(hs0, hs2, hs2 = ⋂ { hs1 ∈ On | hs0 ∈(R1 ` suc(hs1))})
  mpgbir(hs0, { hs0 | ∃(hs2, hs2 = ⋂ { hs1 ∈ On | hs0 ∈(R1 ` suc(hs1))})} = ⋃(R1 " On), (∃(hs2, hs2 = ⋂ { hs1 ∈ On | hs0 ∈(R1 ` suc(hs1))})↔ hs0 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On)))
  abeq1(hs0, ⋃(R1 " On), ∃(hs2, hs2 = ⋂ { hs1 ∈ On | hs0 ∈(R1 ` suc(hs1))}))
  3bitrri(∃(hs2, hs2 = ⋂ { hs1 ∈ On | hs0 ∈(R1 ` suc(hs1))}), hs0 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On), ∃(hs1 ∈ On, hs0 ∈(R1 ` suc(hs1))), ⋂ { hs1 ∈ On | hs0 ∈(R1 ` suc(hs1))} ∈ 𝕌)
  intexrab(hs1, con0, hs0 ∈(R1 ` suc(hs1)))
  isset(hs2, ⋂ { hs1 ∈ On | hs0 ∈(R1 ` suc(hs1))})
  df-fn(crnk, ⋃(R1 " On))

  sylbi(hs0 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On), (rank ` hs0)∈ On, { hs1 ∈ On | hs0 ∈(R1 ` suc(hs1))} ≠ ∅)
  bitr4i(hs0 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On), { hs1 ∈ On | hs0 ∈(R1 ` suc(hs1))} ≠ ∅, ∃(hs1 ∈ On, hs0 ∈(R1 ` suc(hs1))))
  rankwflemb(hs1, hs0)
  rabn0(hs1, con0, hs0 ∈(R1 ` suc(hs1)))
  eqeltrd((rank ` hs0), con0, ⋂ { hs1 ∈ On | hs0 ∈(R1 ` suc(hs1))}, { hs1 ∈ On | hs0 ∈(R1 ` suc(hs1))} ≠ ∅)
  sylbi({ hs1 ∈ On | hs0 ∈(R1 ` suc(hs1))} ≠ ∅, (rank ` hs0)= ⋂ { hs1 ∈ On | hs0 ∈(R1 ` suc(hs1))}, ⋂ { hs1 ∈ On | hs0 ∈(R1 ` suc(hs1))} ∈ 𝕌)
  intex({ hs1 ∈ On | hs0 ∈(R1 ` suc(hs1))})
  mpan(⋂ { hs1 ∈ On | hs0 ∈(R1 ` suc(hs1))} ∈ 𝕌, (rank ` hs0)= ⋂ { hs1 ∈ On | hs0 ∈(R1 ` suc(hs1))}, hs0 ∈ 𝕌)
  vex(hs0)

  df-rank(hs0, hs1)

blocks.name: rankon
blocks.content: The rank of a set is an ordinal number. Proposition 9.15(1) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 79. (Contributed by NM, 5-Oct-2003.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Sep-2013.)

blocks.name: r1elwf
blocks.content: Any member of the cumulative hierarchy is well-founded. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 16-Nov-2014.)

thm r1elwf(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, c1)), wcel(c0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))))
} = {
  sylibr(wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, c1)), wcel(c0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wrex(hs0, con0, wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs0))))))
  syl2anc(wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, c1)), wrex(hs0, con0, wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs0))))), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(c1))))
  sseldi(c1, con0, cdm(cr1), wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, c1)))
  mp2b(wss(cdm(cr1), con0), wlim(cdm(cr1)), word(cdm(cr1)))
  simpri(wlim(cdm(cr1)), wfun(cr1))
  r1funlim()
  limord(cdm(cr1))
  ordsson(cdm(cr1))
  eleqtrrd(c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(c1)), cpw(cfv(cr1, c1)), wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, c1)))
  mpbird(wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, c1)), wcel(c0, cpw(cfv(cr1, c1))), wss(c0, cfv(cr1, c1)))
  ax-mp(wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, c1)), wss(c0, cfv(cr1, c1))), wtr(cfv(cr1, c1)))
  r1tr(c1)
  trss(cfv(cr1, c1), c0)
  elpwg(c0, cfv(cr1, c1), cfv(cr1, c1))
  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, c1)), wceq(cfv(cr1, csuc(c1)), cpw(cfv(cr1, c1))), wcel(c1, cdm(cr1)))
  elfvdm(c0, cr1, c1)
  r1sucg(c1)
  rspcev(hs0, c1, con0, wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(c1))), wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs0)))))
  eleq2d(c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs0))), cfv(cr1, csuc(c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  fveq2d(cr1, csuc(cv(hs0)), csuc(c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))

  diff.hs0.c(con0)

  diff.hs0.c(c0)

blocks.name: rankvalb

This variant of ~ rankval does not use Regularity, and so requires the assumption that ` A ` is in the range of ` R1 ` . (Contributed by NM, 11-Oct-2003.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 10-Sep-2013.)

  df-rank(hs0, s0)
  inteqd(crab(s0, con0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(s0))))), crab(s0, con0, wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(s0))))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  rabbidv(s0, con0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(s0)))), wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(s0)))))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(s0))))
  elex(c0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0)))
  sylbb(wcel(c0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wcel(cint(crab(s0, con0, wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(s0)))))), universe), wrex(s0, con0, wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(s0))))))
  rankwflemb(s0, c0)
  intexrab(s0, con0, wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(s0)))))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cint(crab(s0, con0, wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(s0)))))))
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)

  mpcom(c0 ∈(R1 ` c1), ∃(hs0 ∈ c1, ⋂ { hs0 ∈ On | c0 ∈(R1 ` suc(hs0))} ⊆ hs0), c1 ∈ dom(R1))
  sylbid(c1 ∈ dom(R1), c0 ∈(R1 ` c1), ∃(hs0 ∈ c1, ⋂ { hs0 ∈ On | c0 ∈(R1 ` suc(hs0))} ⊆ hs0), ∃(hs0 ∈ c1, c0 ∈ P((R1 ` hs0))))
  syl6bb(c1 ∈ dom(R1), c0 ∈(R1 ` c1), ∃(hs0 ∈ c1, c0 ∈ P((R1 ` hs0))), c0 ∈ ⋃(hs0 ∈ c1, P((R1 ` hs0))))
  eleq2d(c0, (R1 ` c1), ⋃(hs0 ∈ c1, P((R1 ` hs0))), c1 ∈ dom(R1))
  r1val1(hs0, c1)
  eliun(hs0, c0, c1, P((R1 ` hs0)))
  reximdva(hs0, c1, c1 ∈ dom(R1), c0 ∈ P((R1 ` hs0)), ⋂ { hs0 ∈ On | c0 ∈(R1 ` suc(hs0))} ⊆ hs0)
  sylbird((c1 ∈ dom(R1)∧ hs0 ∈ c1), c0 ∈ P((R1 ` hs0)), ⋂ { hs0 ∈ On | c0 ∈(R1 ` suc(hs0))} ⊆ hs0, c0 ∈(R1 ` suc(hs0)))
  syl((c1 ∈ dom(R1)∧ hs0 ∈ c1), (c0 ∈(R1 ` suc(hs0))↔ c0 ∈ P((R1 ` hs0))), hs0 ∈ dom(R1))
  eleq2d(c0, (R1 ` suc(hs0)), P((R1 ` hs0)), hs0 ∈ dom(R1))
  r1sucg(hs0)
  ex((c1 ∈ dom(R1)∧ hs0 ∈ c1), c0 ∈(R1 ` suc(hs0)), ⋂ { hs0 ∈ On | c0 ∈(R1 ` suc(hs0))} ⊆ hs0)
  sylan((c1 ∈ dom(R1)∧ hs0 ∈ c1), c0 ∈(R1 ` suc(hs0)), ⋂ { hs0 ∈ On | c0 ∈(R1 ` suc(hs0))} ⊆ hs0, hs0 ∈ On)
  sseldi(hs0, con0, dom(R1), (c1 ∈ dom(R1)∧ hs0 ∈ c1))
  ancoms(c1 ∈ dom(R1), hs0 ∈ c1, hs0 ∈ dom(R1))
  ax-mp(((hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ c1 ∈ dom(R1))→ hs0 ∈ dom(R1)), Ord(dom(R1)))
  ordtr1(dom(R1), hs0, c1)
  sylbir((hs0 ∈ On ∧ c0 ∈(R1 ` suc(hs0))), ⋂ { hs0 ∈ On | c0 ∈(R1 ` suc(hs0))} ⊆ hs0, hs0 ∈ { hs0 ∈ On | c0 ∈(R1 ` suc(hs0))})
  rabid(hs0, con0, c0 ∈(R1 ` suc(hs0)))
  intss1(hs0, { hs0 ∈ On | c0 ∈(R1 ` suc(hs0))})
  rexlimdva(hs0, c1, c0 ∈(R1 ` c1), ⋂ { hs0 ∈ On | c0 ∈(R1 ` suc(hs0))} ⊆ hs0, (rank ` c0)∈ c1)
  sylbird((c0 ∈(R1 ` c1)∧ hs0 ∈ c1), ⋂ { hs0 ∈ On | c0 ∈(R1 ` suc(hs0))} ⊆ hs0, (rank ` c0)∈ c1, (rank ` c0)⊆ hs0)
  adantr(c0 ∈(R1 ` c1), hs0 ∈ c1, ((rank ` c0)⊆ hs0 ↔ ⋂ { hs0 ∈ On | c0 ∈(R1 ` suc(hs0))} ⊆ hs0))
  sseq1d((rank ` c0), hs0, ⋂ { hs0 ∈ On | c0 ∈(R1 ` suc(hs0))}, c0 ∈(R1 ` c1))
  syl(c0 ∈(R1 ` c1), (rank ` c0)= ⋂ { hs0 ∈ On | c0 ∈(R1 ` suc(hs0))}, c0 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On))
  r1elwf(c0, c1)
  rankvalb(hs0, c0)
  imp(c0 ∈(R1 ` c1), hs0 ∈ c1, ((rank ` c0)⊆ hs0 →(rank ` c0)∈ c1))
  expcomd(c0 ∈(R1 ` c1), hs0 ∈ c1, (rank ` c0)⊆ hs0, (rank ` c0)∈ c1)
  sylancr(c0 ∈(R1 ` c1), (((rank ` c0)⊆ hs0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1)→(rank ` c0)∈ c1), (rank ` c0)∈ On, c1 ∈ On)
  rankon(c0)
  sseldi(c1, con0, dom(R1), c0 ∈(R1 ` c1))
  ax-mp(dom(R1)⊆ On, Ord(dom(R1)))
  ax-mp(Ord(dom(R1)), Lim(dom(R1)))
  simpri(Lim(dom(R1)), Fun(R1))
  r1funlim()
  limord(dom(R1))
  ordsson(dom(R1))
  elfvdm(c0, cr1, c1)
  ontr2((rank ` c0), c1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(c1 ∈ dom(R1))
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ∈(R1 ` c1))
  diff.hs0.w((rank ` c0)∈ c1)
}

blocks.name: rankvaln
blocks.content: Value of the rank function at a non-well-founded set. (The antecedent is always false under Foundation, by ~ unir1 , unless ` A ` is a proper class.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Mar-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 10-Sep-2013.)

blocks.name: rankidb
blocks.content: Identity law for the rank function. (Contributed by NM, 3-Oct-2003.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Mar-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm rankidb(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(cfv(crnk, c0)))))
} = {
  eleqtrrd(c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(cfv(crnk, c0))), cfv(cr1, csuc(cint(crab(hs0, con0, wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs0)))))))), wcel(c0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))))
  sylbi(wcel(c0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(cint(crab(hs0, con0, wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs0))))))))), wrex(hs0, con0, wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs0))))))
  rankwflemb(hs0, c0)
  onminsb(hs0, wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs0)))), wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(cint(crab(hs0, con0, wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs0))))))))))
  nfel2(hs0, c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(cint(crab(hs0, con0, wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs0)))))))))
  nffv(hs0, cr1, csuc(cint(crab(hs0, con0, wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs0))))))))
  nfcv(hs0, cr1)
  nfsuc(hs0, cint(crab(hs0, con0, wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs0)))))))
  nfint(hs0, crab(hs0, con0, wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs0))))))
  nfrab1(hs0, con0, wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs0)))))
  eleq2d(c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs0))), cfv(cr1, csuc(cint(crab(hs0, con0, wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs0)))))))), wceq(cv(hs0), cint(crab(hs0, con0, wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs0))))))))
  fveq2d(cr1, csuc(cv(hs0)), csuc(cint(crab(hs0, con0, wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs0))))))), wceq(cv(hs0), cint(crab(hs0, con0, wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs0))))))))
  suceq(cv(hs0), cint(crab(hs0, con0, wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs0)))))))
  fveq2d(cr1, csuc(cfv(crnk, c0)), csuc(cint(crab(hs0, con0, wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs0))))))), wcel(c0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))))
  syl(wcel(c0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wceq(csuc(cfv(crnk, c0)), csuc(cint(crab(hs0, con0, wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs0)))))))), wceq(cfv(crnk, c0), cint(crab(hs0, con0, wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs0))))))))
  rankvalb(hs0, c0)
  suceq(cfv(crnk, c0), cint(crab(hs0, con0, wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs0)))))))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cr1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm rankidb(class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On)→ c0 ∈(R1 ` suc((rank ` c0))))
} = {
  eleqtrrd(c0, (R1 ` suc((rank ` c0))), (R1 ` suc(⋂ { hs0 ∈ On | c0 ∈(R1 ` suc(hs0))})), c0 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On))
  sylbi(c0 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On), c0 ∈(R1 ` suc(⋂ { hs0 ∈ On | c0 ∈(R1 ` suc(hs0))})), ∃(hs0 ∈ On, c0 ∈(R1 ` suc(hs0))))
  rankwflemb(hs0, c0)
  onminsb(hs0, c0 ∈(R1 ` suc(hs0)), c0 ∈(R1 ` suc(⋂ { hs0 ∈ On | c0 ∈(R1 ` suc(hs0))})))
  nfel2(hs0, c0, (R1 ` suc(⋂ { hs0 ∈ On | c0 ∈(R1 ` suc(hs0))})))
  nffv(hs0, cr1, suc(⋂ { hs0 ∈ On | c0 ∈(R1 ` suc(hs0))}))
  nfcv(hs0, cr1)
  nfsuc(hs0, ⋂ { hs0 ∈ On | c0 ∈(R1 ` suc(hs0))})
  nfint(hs0, { hs0 ∈ On | c0 ∈(R1 ` suc(hs0))})
  nfrab1(hs0, con0, c0 ∈(R1 ` suc(hs0)))
  eleq2d(c0, (R1 ` suc(hs0)), (R1 ` suc(⋂ { hs0 ∈ On | c0 ∈(R1 ` suc(hs0))})), hs0 = ⋂ { hs0 ∈ On | c0 ∈(R1 ` suc(hs0))})
  fveq2d(cr1, suc(hs0), suc(⋂ { hs0 ∈ On | c0 ∈(R1 ` suc(hs0))}), hs0 = ⋂ { hs0 ∈ On | c0 ∈(R1 ` suc(hs0))})
  suceq(hs0, ⋂ { hs0 ∈ On | c0 ∈(R1 ` suc(hs0))})
  fveq2d(cr1, suc((rank ` c0)), suc(⋂ { hs0 ∈ On | c0 ∈(R1 ` suc(hs0))}), c0 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On))
  syl(c0 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On), suc((rank ` c0))= suc(⋂ { hs0 ∈ On | c0 ∈(R1 ` suc(hs0))}), (rank ` c0)= ⋂ { hs0 ∈ On | c0 ∈(R1 ` suc(hs0))})
  rankvalb(hs0, c0)
  suceq((rank ` c0), ⋂ { hs0 ∈ On | c0 ∈(R1 ` suc(hs0))})
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cr1)
}

blocks.name: rankdmr1
blocks.content: A rank is a member of the cumulative hierarchy. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Nov-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm rankdmr1(class c0) {
  |- wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), cdm(cr1))
} = {
  pm2.61i(wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), cdm(cr1)), wcel(c0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))))
  sylibr(wcel(c0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), cdm(cr1)), wcel(csuc(cfv(crnk, c0)), cdm(cr1)))
  syl(wcel(c0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wcel(csuc(cfv(crnk, c0)), cdm(cr1)), wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(cfv(crnk, c0)))))
  rankidb(c0)
  elfvdm(c0, cr1, csuc(cfv(crnk, c0)))
  ax-mp(wb(wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), cdm(cr1)), wcel(csuc(cfv(crnk, c0)), cdm(cr1))), wlim(cdm(cr1)))
  limsuc(cdm(cr1), cfv(crnk, c0))
  syl6eqel(cfv(crnk, c0), cdm(cr1), emptycls, wn(wcel(c0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0)))))
  rankvaln(c0)
  sselii(emptycls, cdm(cr1), com)
  ax-mp(wss(com, cdm(cr1)), wlim(cdm(cr1)))
  simpri(wlim(cdm(cr1)), wfun(cr1))
  r1funlim()
  limomss(cdm(cr1))
  peano1()
}
blocks.pretty:
thm rankdmr1(class c0) {
  ⊢ (rank ` c0)∈ dom(R1)
} = {
  pm2.61i((rank ` c0)∈ dom(R1), c0 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On))
  sylibr(c0 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On), (rank ` c0)∈ dom(R1), suc((rank ` c0))∈ dom(R1))
  syl(c0 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On), suc((rank ` c0))∈ dom(R1), c0 ∈(R1 ` suc((rank ` c0))))
  rankidb(c0)
  elfvdm(c0, cr1, suc((rank ` c0)))
  ax-mp(((rank ` c0)∈ dom(R1)↔ suc((rank ` c0))∈ dom(R1)), Lim(dom(R1)))
  limsuc(dom(R1), (rank ` c0))
  syl6eqel((rank ` c0), dom(R1), emptycls, ¬ c0 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On))
  rankvaln(c0)
  sselii(emptycls, dom(R1), com)
  ax-mp(_om ⊆ dom(R1), Lim(dom(R1)))
  simpri(Lim(dom(R1)), Fun(R1))
  r1funlim()
  limomss(dom(R1))
  peano1()
}

blocks.name: rankr1ag
blocks.content: A version of ~ rankr1a that is suitable without assuming Regularity or Replacement. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jun-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 17-Nov-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm rankr1ag(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wcel(c1, cdm(cr1))), wb(wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, c1)), wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), c1)))
} = {
  impbid2(wa(wcel(c0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wcel(c1, cdm(cr1))), wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, c1)), wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), c1))
  rankr1ai(c0, c1)
  3syld(wa(wcel(c0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wcel(c1, cdm(cr1))), wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), c1), wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, c1)), wss(csuc(cfv(crnk, c0)), c1), wss(cfv(cr1, csuc(cfv(crnk, c0))), cfv(cr1, c1)))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wcel(c1, cdm(cr1))), wi(wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), c1), wss(csuc(cfv(crnk, c0)), c1)), word(c1))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wcel(c1, cdm(cr1)), word(c1))
  mpan(wcel(c1, cdm(cr1)), word(c1), word(cdm(cr1)))
  ax-mp(word(cdm(cr1)), wlim(cdm(cr1)))
  simpri(wlim(cdm(cr1)), wfun(cr1))
  r1funlim()
  limord(cdm(cr1))
  ordelord(cdm(cr1), c1)
  ordsucss(c1, cfv(crnk, c0))
  sylan(wcel(c0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wcel(c1, cdm(cr1)), wi(wss(csuc(cfv(crnk, c0)), c1), wss(cfv(cr1, csuc(cfv(crnk, c0))), cfv(cr1, c1))), wcel(csuc(cfv(crnk, c0)), cdm(cr1)))
  syl(wcel(c0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wcel(csuc(cfv(crnk, c0)), cdm(cr1)), wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(cfv(crnk, c0)))))
  elfvdm(c0, cr1, csuc(cfv(crnk, c0)))
  r1ord3g(csuc(cfv(crnk, c0)), c1)
  syl5com(wa(wcel(c0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wcel(c1, cdm(cr1))), wss(cfv(cr1, csuc(cfv(crnk, c0))), cfv(cr1, c1)), wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, c1)), wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(cfv(crnk, c0)))))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wcel(c1, cdm(cr1)), wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(cfv(crnk, c0)))))
  rankidb(c0)
  ssel(cfv(cr1, csuc(cfv(crnk, c0))), cfv(cr1, c1), c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm rankr1ag(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On)∧ c1 ∈ dom(R1))→(c0 ∈(R1 ` c1)↔(rank ` c0)∈ c1))
} = {
  impbid2((c0 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On)∧ c1 ∈ dom(R1)), c0 ∈(R1 ` c1), (rank ` c0)∈ c1)
  rankr1ai(c0, c1)
  3syld((c0 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On)∧ c1 ∈ dom(R1)), (rank ` c0)∈ c1, c0 ∈(R1 ` c1), suc((rank ` c0))⊆ c1, (R1 ` suc((rank ` c0)))⊆(R1 ` c1))
  syl((c0 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On)∧ c1 ∈ dom(R1)), ((rank ` c0)∈ c1 → suc((rank ` c0))⊆ c1), Ord(c1))
  adantl(c0 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On), c1 ∈ dom(R1), Ord(c1))
  mpan(c1 ∈ dom(R1), Ord(c1), Ord(dom(R1)))
  ax-mp(Ord(dom(R1)), Lim(dom(R1)))
  simpri(Lim(dom(R1)), Fun(R1))
  r1funlim()
  limord(dom(R1))
  ordelord(dom(R1), c1)
  ordsucss(c1, (rank ` c0))
  sylan(c0 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On), c1 ∈ dom(R1), (suc((rank ` c0))⊆ c1 →(R1 ` suc((rank ` c0)))⊆(R1 ` c1)), suc((rank ` c0))∈ dom(R1))
  syl(c0 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On), suc((rank ` c0))∈ dom(R1), c0 ∈(R1 ` suc((rank ` c0))))
  elfvdm(c0, cr1, suc((rank ` c0)))
  r1ord3g(suc((rank ` c0)), c1)
  syl5com((c0 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On)∧ c1 ∈ dom(R1)), (R1 ` suc((rank ` c0)))⊆(R1 ` c1), c0 ∈(R1 ` c1), c0 ∈(R1 ` suc((rank ` c0))))
  adantr(c0 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On), c1 ∈ dom(R1), c0 ∈(R1 ` suc((rank ` c0))))
  rankidb(c0)
  ssel((R1 ` suc((rank ` c0))), (R1 ` c1), c0)
}

blocks.name: rankr1bg
blocks.content: A relationship between rank and ` R1 ` . See ~ rankr1ag for the membership version. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Nov-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm rankr1bg(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wcel(c1, cdm(cr1))), wb(wss(c0, cfv(cr1, c1)), wss(cfv(crnk, c0), c1)))
} = {
  3bitr4d(wa(wcel(c0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wcel(c1, cdm(cr1))), wss(c0, cfv(cr1, c1)), wss(cfv(crnk, c0), c1), wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(c1))), wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), csuc(c1)))
  sylan2b(wcel(c0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wcel(c1, cdm(cr1)), wb(wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(c1))), wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), csuc(c1))), wcel(csuc(c1), cdm(cr1)))
  ax-mp(wb(wcel(c1, cdm(cr1)), wcel(csuc(c1), cdm(cr1))), wlim(cdm(cr1)))
  limsuc(cdm(cr1), c1)
  rankr1ag(c0, csuc(c1))
  syl6rbb(wa(wcel(c0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wcel(c1, cdm(cr1))), wss(c0, cfv(cr1, c1)), wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(c1))), wcel(c0, cpw(cfv(cr1, c1))))
  eleq2d(c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(c1)), cpw(cfv(cr1, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wcel(c1, cdm(cr1))))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wcel(c1, cdm(cr1)), wceq(cfv(cr1, csuc(c1)), cpw(cfv(cr1, c1))))
  r1sucg(c1)
  elpw2(c0, cfv(cr1, c1))
  fvex(cr1, c1)
  sylancr(wa(wcel(c0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wcel(c1, cdm(cr1))), wb(wss(cfv(crnk, c0), c1), wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), csuc(c1))), wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), con0), wcel(c1, con0))
  rankon(c0)
  adantl(wcel(c0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wcel(c1, cdm(cr1)), wcel(c1, con0))
  mpan(wcel(c1, cdm(cr1)), wcel(c1, con0), word(cdm(cr1)))
  ax-mp(word(cdm(cr1)), wlim(cdm(cr1)))
  simpri(wlim(cdm(cr1)), wfun(cr1))
  r1funlim()
  limord(cdm(cr1))
  ordelon(cdm(cr1), c1)
  onsssuc(cfv(crnk, c0), c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm rankr1bg(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On)∧ c1 ∈ dom(R1))→(c0 ⊆(R1 ` c1)↔(rank ` c0)⊆ c1))
} = {
  3bitr4d((c0 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On)∧ c1 ∈ dom(R1)), c0 ⊆(R1 ` c1), (rank ` c0)⊆ c1, c0 ∈(R1 ` suc(c1)), (rank ` c0)∈ suc(c1))
  sylan2b(c0 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On), c1 ∈ dom(R1), (c0 ∈(R1 ` suc(c1))↔(rank ` c0)∈ suc(c1)), suc(c1)∈ dom(R1))
  ax-mp((c1 ∈ dom(R1)↔ suc(c1)∈ dom(R1)), Lim(dom(R1)))
  limsuc(dom(R1), c1)
  rankr1ag(c0, suc(c1))
  syl6rbb((c0 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On)∧ c1 ∈ dom(R1)), c0 ⊆(R1 ` c1), c0 ∈(R1 ` suc(c1)), c0 ∈ P((R1 ` c1)))
  eleq2d(c0, (R1 ` suc(c1)), P((R1 ` c1)), (c0 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On)∧ c1 ∈ dom(R1)))
  adantl(c0 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On), c1 ∈ dom(R1), (R1 ` suc(c1))= P((R1 ` c1)))
  r1sucg(c1)
  elpw2(c0, (R1 ` c1))
  fvex(cr1, c1)

  syl6ss(c0, (R1 `((rank ` c0)⋃(rank ` c1))), (R1 `(rank ` c0)), (c0 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On)∧ c1 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On)))
  adantr(c0 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On), c1 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On), c0 ⊆(R1 `(rank ` c0)))
  r1rankidb(c0)
  ax-mp((R1 `(rank ` c0))⊆(R1 `((rank ` c0)⋃(rank ` c1))), (rank ` c0)⊆((rank ` c0)⋃(rank ` c1)))
  ssun1((rank ` c0), (rank ` c1))
  mp2an(((rank ` c0)⊆((rank ` c0)⋃(rank ` c1))→(R1 `(rank ` c0))⊆(R1 `((rank ` c0)⋃(rank ` c1)))), (rank ` c0)∈ dom(R1), ((rank ` c0)⋃(rank ` c1))∈ dom(R1))
  r1ord3g((rank ` c0), ((rank ` c0)⋃(rank ` c1)))
  syl6ss(c1, (R1 `((rank ` c0)⋃(rank ` c1))), (R1 `(rank ` c1)), (c0 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On)∧ c1 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On)))
  adantl(c0 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On), c1 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On), c1 ⊆(R1 `(rank ` c1)))
  r1rankidb(c1)
  ax-mp((R1 `(rank ` c1))⊆(R1 `((rank ` c0)⋃(rank ` c1))), (rank ` c1)⊆((rank ` c0)⋃(rank ` c1)))
  ssun2((rank ` c1), (rank ` c0))
  mp2an(((rank ` c1)⊆((rank ` c0)⋃(rank ` c1))→(R1 `(rank ` c1))⊆(R1 `((rank ` c0)⋃(rank ` c1)))), (rank ` c1)∈ dom(R1), ((rank ` c0)⋃(rank ` c1))∈ dom(R1))
  r1ord3g((rank ` c1), ((rank ` c0)⋃(rank ` c1)))

blocks.name: prwf
blocks.content: An unordered pair is well-founded if its elements are. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-Jun-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 17-Nov-2014.)

blocks.name: opwf
blocks.content: An ordered pair is well-founded if its elements are. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-Jun-2013.)

blocks.name: unir1
blocks.content: The cumulative hierarchy of sets covers the universe. Proposition 4.45 (b) to (a) of [Mendelson] p. 281. (Contributed by NM, 27-Sep-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 8-Jun-2013.)

blocks.name: jech9.3
blocks.content: Every set belongs to some value of the cumulative hierarchy of sets function ` R1 ` , i.e. the indexed union of all values of ` R1 ` is the universe. Lemma 9.3 of [Jech] p. 71. (Contributed by NM, 4-Oct-2003.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 8-Jun-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm jech9.3(setvar s0) {
  |- wceq(ciun(s0, con0, cfv(cr1, cv(s0))), universe)
} = {
  3eqtr2i(ciun(s0, con0, cfv(cr1, cv(s0))), universe, cuni(crn(cr1)), cuni(cima(cr1, con0)))
  ax-mp(wceq(ciun(s0, con0, cfv(cr1, cv(s0))), cuni(crn(cr1))), wfn(cr1, con0))
  fniunfv(s0, cr1, con0)
  unieqi(cima(cr1, con0), crn(cr1))
  eqtr3i(cima(cr1, con0), crn(cr1), cima(cr1, cdm(cr1)))
  imaeq2i(cr1, cdm(cr1), con0)
  ax-mp(wceq(cdm(cr1), con0), wfn(cr1, con0))
  r1fnon()
  fndm(cr1, con0)
  imadmrn(cr1)
  unir1()
  diff.cr1.s(s0)
  diff.con0.s(s0)
}

  unieqi((R1 " On), ran(R1))
  eqtr3i((R1 " On), ran(R1), (R1 " dom(R1)))
  imaeq2i(cr1, dom(R1), con0)

  r1fnon()

  unir1()
  diff.cr1.s(s0)
  diff.con0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: rankwflem
blocks.content: Every set is well-founded, assuming the Axiom of Regularity. Proposition 9.13 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 78. This variant of ~ tz9.13g is useful in proofs of theorems about the rank function. (Contributed by NM, 4-Oct-2003.)

blocks.name: rankvalg

thm rankvalg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {

  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  vtoclg(hs0, c0, c1, wceq(cfv(crnk, c0), cint(crab(s0, con0, wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(s0))))))), wceq(cfv(crnk, cv(hs0)), cint(crab(s0, con0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(s0))))))))
  eqeq12d(cfv(crnk, cv(hs0)), cint(crab(s0, con0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(s0)))))), cfv(crnk, c0), cint(crab(s0, con0, wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(s0)))))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, crnk)
  inteqd(crab(s0, con0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(s0))))), crab(s0, con0, wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(s0))))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  rabbidv(s0, con0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(s0)))), wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(s0)))))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(s0))))
  rankval(s0, cv(hs0))
  vex(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cfv(crnk, c0), cint(crab(s0, con0, wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(s0))))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

thm rankvalg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {

thm uniwf(class c0) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wcel(cuni(c0), cuni(cima(cr1, con0))))

  syl6sseq(c0, cpw(cfv(cr1, cfv(crnk, c0))), cfv(cr1, csuc(cfv(crnk, c0))), wcel(c0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))))
  mpsyl(wcel(c0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wss(c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(cfv(crnk, c0)))), wtr(cfv(cr1, csuc(cfv(crnk, c0)))), wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(cfv(crnk, c0)))))
  r1tr(csuc(cfv(crnk, c0)))
  rankidb(c0)

  rankdmr1(c0)

  pwuni(c0)

  ⊢ (c0 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On)↔ ⋃ c0 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On))
} = {

thm rankr1clem(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wcel(c1, cdm(cr1))), wb(wn(wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, c1))), wss(c1, cfv(crnk, c0))))

  notbid(wa(wcel(c0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wcel(c1, cdm(cr1))), wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, c1)), wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), c1))
  rankr1ag(c0, c1)
  sylancl(wa(wcel(c0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wcel(c1, cdm(cr1))), wb(wss(c1, cfv(crnk, c0)), wn(wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), c1))), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), con0))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wcel(c1, cdm(cr1)), wcel(c1, con0))
  mpan(wcel(c1, cdm(cr1)), wcel(c1, con0), word(cdm(cr1)))
  ax-mp(word(cdm(cr1)), wlim(cdm(cr1)))
  simpri(wlim(cdm(cr1)), wfun(cr1))
  r1funlim()
  limord(cdm(cr1))

thm rankr1clem(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On)∧ c1 ∈ dom(R1))→(¬ c0 ∈(R1 ` c1)↔ c1 ⊆(rank ` c0)))
} = {
  bitr4d((c0 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On)∧ c1 ∈ dom(R1)), ¬ c0 ∈(R1 ` c1), c1 ⊆(rank ` c0), ¬(rank ` c0)∈ c1)

  adantl(c0 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On), c1 ∈ dom(R1), c1 ∈ On)

blocks.name: rankr1c

blocks.origin:
thm rankr1c(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wb(wceq(c1, cfv(crnk, c0)), wa(wn(wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, c1))), wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(c1))))))
} = {
  pm5.21ndd(wcel(c0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wceq(c1, cfv(crnk, c0)), wa(wn(wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, c1))), wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(c1)))), wcel(c1, cdm(cr1)))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wi(wceq(c1, cfv(crnk, c0)), wcel(c1, cdm(cr1))))
  syl6eqel(c1, cdm(cr1), cfv(crnk, c0), wceq(c1, cfv(crnk, c0)))
  id(wceq(c1, cfv(crnk, c0)))

  adantl(wn(wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, c1))), wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(c1))), wcel(c1, cdm(cr1)))

  syl6rbbr((c0 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On)∧ c1 ∈ dom(R1)), c1 =(rank ` c0), (¬ c0 ∈(R1 ` c1)∧ c0 ∈(R1 ` suc(c1))), (c1 ⊆(rank ` c0)∧(rank ` c0)⊆ c1))

blocks.name: rankelb
blocks.content: The membership relation is inherited by the rank function. Proposition 9.16 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 79. (Contributed by NM, 4-Oct-2003.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 17-Nov-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm rankelb(class c0, class c1) {

} = {

  mt3d(wa(wcel(c0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wcel(c1, c0)), wcel(cfv(crnk, c1), cfv(crnk, c0)), wcel(c1, cfv(cr1, cfv(crnk, c1))))
  imp(wcel(c0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wcel(c1, c0), wn(wcel(c1, cfv(cr1, cfv(crnk, c1)))))
  syl6(wcel(c0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wcel(c1, c0), wn(wcel(c1, cfv(cr1, cfv(crnk, c1)))), wcel(c1, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))))
  sseld(c1, c0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0)), wcel(c0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))))
  r1elssi(c0)
  rankidn(c1)
  syl5bir(wa(wcel(c0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wcel(c1, c0)), wn(wcel(cfv(crnk, c1), cfv(crnk, c0))), wcel(c1, cfv(cr1, cfv(crnk, c1))), wss(cfv(crnk, c0), cfv(crnk, c1)))
  mp2an(wb(wss(cfv(crnk, c0), cfv(crnk, c1)), wn(wcel(cfv(crnk, c1), cfv(crnk, c0)))), wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), con0), wcel(cfv(crnk, c1), con0))
  rankon(c0)
  rankon(c1)
  ontri1(cfv(crnk, c0), cfv(crnk, c1))
  syl2imc(wa(wcel(c0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wcel(c1, c0)), wss(cfv(crnk, c0), cfv(crnk, c1)), wcel(c1, cfv(cr1, cfv(crnk, c1))), wss(cfv(cr1, cfv(crnk, c0)), cfv(cr1, cfv(crnk, c1))), wcel(c1, cfv(cr1, cfv(crnk, c0))))
  mp2an(wi(wss(cfv(crnk, c0), cfv(crnk, c1)), wss(cfv(cr1, cfv(crnk, c0)), cfv(cr1, cfv(crnk, c1)))), wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), cdm(cr1)), wcel(cfv(crnk, c1), cdm(cr1)))
  rankdmr1(c0)
  rankdmr1(c1)
  r1ord3g(cfv(crnk, c0), cfv(crnk, c1))
  sselda(c1, c0, cfv(cr1, cfv(crnk, c0)), wcel(c0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))))
  r1rankidb(c0)
  ssel(cfv(cr1, cfv(crnk, c0)), cfv(cr1, cfv(crnk, c1)), c1)
}

  mp2an(((rank ` c0)⊆(rank ` c1)↔ ¬(rank ` c1)∈(rank ` c0)), (rank ` c0)∈ On, (rank ` c1)∈ On)
  rankon(c0)

  mp2an(((rank ` c0)⊆(rank ` c1)→(R1 `(rank ` c0))⊆(R1 `(rank ` c1))), (rank ` c0)∈ dom(R1), (rank ` c1)∈ dom(R1))

blocks.name: wfelirr
blocks.content: A well-founded set is not a member of itself. This proof does not require the axiom of regularity, unlike ~ elirr . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jan-2017.)

blocks.name: rankval3b
blocks.content: The value of the rank function expressed recursively: the rank of a set is the smallest ordinal number containing the ranks of all members of the set. Proposition 9.17 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 79. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Nov-2014.)

thm rankval3b(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {

  alrimiv(s0, wcel(c0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), con0), wral(s1, c0, wcel(cfv(crnk, cv(s1)), cv(s0)))), wss(cfv(crnk, c0), cv(s0))))
  ex(wcel(c0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), con0), wral(s1, c0, wcel(cfv(crnk, cv(s1)), cv(s0)))), wss(cfv(crnk, c0), cv(s0)))

  sylbird(wa(wcel(c0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), con0), wral(s1, c0, wcel(cfv(crnk, cv(s1)), cv(s0))))), wn(wss(cfv(crnk, c0), cv(s0))), wss(cfv(crnk, c0), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(crnk, c0)))
  con2bid(wa(wcel(c0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), con0), wral(s1, c0, wcel(cfv(crnk, cv(s1)), cv(s0))))), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(crnk, c0)), wss(cfv(crnk, c0), cv(s0)))
  sylancr(wa(wcel(c0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), con0), wral(s1, c0, wcel(cfv(crnk, cv(s1)), cv(s0))))), wb(wss(cfv(crnk, c0), cv(s0)), wn(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(crnk, c0)))), wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), con0), wcel(cv(s0), con0))
  simprl(wcel(c0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wcel(cv(s0), con0), wral(s1, c0, wcel(cfv(crnk, cv(s1)), cv(s0))))
  ontri1(cfv(crnk, c0), cv(s0))

  adantr((hs0 ∈ dom(R1)∧ hs1 ∈ hs0), (hs1 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On)∧(rank ` hs1)= hs1), hs1 ∈ dom(R1))

blocks.name: rankonid
blocks.content: The rank of an ordinal number is itself. Proposition 9.18 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 79 and its converse. (Contributed by NM, 14-Oct-2003.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 17-Nov-2014.)

blocks.name: onwf
blocks.content: The ordinals are all well-founded. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Mar-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 17-Nov-2014.)

blocks.name: onssr1
blocks.content: Initial segments of the ordinals are contained in initial segments of the cumulative hierarchy. (Contributed by FL, 20-Apr-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 17-Nov-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm onssr1(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cdm(cr1)), wss(c0, cfv(cr1, c0)))
} = {
  ssrdv(hs0, c0, cfv(cr1, c0), wcel(c0, cdm(cr1)))
  ex(wcel(c0, cdm(cr1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cr1, c0)))
  mpbird(wa(wcel(c0, cdm(cr1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cr1, c0)), wcel(cfv(crnk, cv(hs0)), c0))
  eqeltrd(cfv(crnk, cv(hs0)), c0, cv(hs0), wa(wcel(c0, cdm(cr1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  simprd(wa(wcel(c0, cdm(cr1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wceq(cfv(crnk, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(cima(cr1, con0))))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cdm(cr1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, cdm(cr1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cr1, c0)), wcel(cfv(crnk, cv(hs0)), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wcel(c0, cdm(cr1)))
  simpld(wa(wcel(c0, cdm(cr1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wceq(cfv(crnk, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cdm(cr1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wceq(cfv(crnk, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(cr1)))
  ancoms(wcel(c0, cdm(cr1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(cr1)))
  mp2b(wi(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(c0, cdm(cr1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(cr1))), wlim(cdm(cr1)), word(cdm(cr1)))
  simpri(wlim(cdm(cr1)), wfun(cr1))
  r1funlim()
  limord(cdm(cr1))
  ordtr1(cdm(cr1), cv(hs0), c0)
  rankonidlem(cv(hs0))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cdm(cr1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  rankr1ag(cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cr1, c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cdm(cr1)))
}

thm onssr1(class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ dom(R1)→ c0 ⊆(R1 ` c0))
} = {
  ssrdv(hs0, c0, (R1 ` c0), c0 ∈ dom(R1))
  ex(c0 ∈ dom(R1), hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈(R1 ` c0))
  mpbird((c0 ∈ dom(R1)∧ hs0 ∈ c0), hs0 ∈(R1 ` c0), (rank ` hs0)∈ c0)
  eqeltrd((rank ` hs0), c0, hs0, (c0 ∈ dom(R1)∧ hs0 ∈ c0))
  simprd((c0 ∈ dom(R1)∧ hs0 ∈ c0), (rank ` hs0)= hs0, hs0 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On))
  simpr(c0 ∈ dom(R1), hs0 ∈ c0)
  syl2anc((c0 ∈ dom(R1)∧ hs0 ∈ c0), (hs0 ∈(R1 ` c0)↔(rank ` hs0)∈ c0), hs0 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On), c0 ∈ dom(R1))
  simpld((c0 ∈ dom(R1)∧ hs0 ∈ c0), hs0 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On), (rank ` hs0)= hs0)
  syl((c0 ∈ dom(R1)∧ hs0 ∈ c0), (hs0 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On)∧(rank ` hs0)= hs0), hs0 ∈ dom(R1))
  ancoms(c0 ∈ dom(R1), hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ dom(R1))
  mp2b(((hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ c0 ∈ dom(R1))→ hs0 ∈ dom(R1)), Lim(dom(R1)), Ord(dom(R1)))
  simpri(Lim(dom(R1)), Fun(R1))
  r1funlim()
  limord(dom(R1))
  ordtr1(dom(R1), hs0, c0)
  rankonidlem(hs0)
  simpl(c0 ∈ dom(R1), hs0 ∈ c0)
  rankr1ag(hs0, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((R1 ` c0))
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ∈ dom(R1))
}

blocks.name: rankr1g
blocks.content: A relationship between the rank function and the cumulative hierarchy of sets function ` R1 ` . Proposition 9.15(2) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 79. (Contributed by NM, 6-Oct-2003.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 17-Nov-2014.)

blocks.name: rankid
blocks.content: Identity law for the rank function. (Contributed by NM, 3-Oct-2003.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 17-Nov-2014.)

blocks.name: rankr1
blocks.content: A relationship between the rank function and the cumulative hierarchy of sets function ` R1 ` . Proposition 9.15(2) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 79. (Contributed by NM, 6-Oct-2003.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 17-Nov-2014.)

blocks.name: ssrankr1
blocks.content: A relationship between an ordinal number less than or equal to a rank, and the cumulative hierarchy of sets ` R1 ` . Proposition 9.15(3) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 79. (Contributed by NM, 8-Oct-2003.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 17-Nov-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm ssrankr1(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, con0), wb(wss(c0, cfv(crnk, c1)), wn(wcel(c1, cfv(cr1, c0)))))
  -| wcel(c1, universe)
} = {
  bicomd(wcel(c0, con0), wss(c0, cfv(crnk, c1)), wn(wcel(c1, cfv(cr1, c0))))
  sylancr(wcel(c0, con0), wb(wn(wcel(c1, cfv(cr1, c0))), wss(c0, cfv(crnk, c1))), wcel(c1, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wcel(c0, cdm(cr1)))
  eleqtrri(c1, cuni(cima(cr1, con0)), universe)
  unir1()
  biimpri(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c0, cdm(cr1)))
  eleq2i(c0, cdm(cr1), con0)
  ax-mp(wceq(cdm(cr1), con0), wfn(cr1, con0))
  r1fnon()
  fndm(cr1, con0)
  rankr1clem(c1, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ssrankr1(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ On →(c0 ⊆(rank ` c1)↔ ¬ c1 ∈(R1 ` c0)))
  ⊣ c1 ∈ 𝕌
} = {
  bicomd(c0 ∈ On, c0 ⊆(rank ` c1), ¬ c1 ∈(R1 ` c0))
  sylancr(c0 ∈ On, (¬ c1 ∈(R1 ` c0)↔ c0 ⊆(rank ` c1)), c1 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On), c0 ∈ dom(R1))
  eleqtrri(c1, ⋃(R1 " On), universe)
  unir1()
  biimpri(c0 ∈ On, c0 ∈ dom(R1))
  eleq2i(c0, dom(R1), con0)
  ax-mp(dom(R1)= On, R1[Fn]On)
  r1fnon()
  fndm(cr1, con0)
  rankr1clem(c1, c0)
}

blocks.name: rankr1a
blocks.content: A relationship between rank and ` R1 ` , clearly equivalent to ~ ssrankr1 and friends through trichotomy, but in Raph's opinion considerably more intuitive. See ~ rankr1b for the subset version. (Contributed by Raph Levien, 29-May-2004.)

blocks.name: r1val2
blocks.content: The value of the cumulative hierarchy of sets function expressed in terms of rank. Definition 15.19 of [Monk1] p. 113. (Contributed by NM, 30-Nov-2003.)

blocks.name: r1val3
blocks.content: The value of the cumulative hierarchy of sets function expressed in terms of rank. Theorem 15.18 of [Monk1] p. 113. (Contributed by NM, 30-Nov-2003.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 17-Nov-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm r1val3(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, con0), wceq(cfv(cr1, c0), ciun(s0, c0, cpw(cab(s1, wcel(cfv(crnk, cv(s1)), cv(s0)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, con0), wceq(cfv(cr1, c0), ciun(s0, c0, cpw(cab(s1, wcel(cfv(crnk, cv(s1)), cv(s0))))))), diffsc(s1, c0))
  eqtrd(cfv(cr1, c0), ciun(s0, c0, cpw(cab(s1, wcel(cfv(crnk, cv(s1)), cv(s0))))), ciun(s0, c0, cpw(cfv(cr1, cv(s0)))), wcel(c0, con0))
  sylbir(wcel(c0, con0), wceq(cfv(cr1, c0), ciun(s0, c0, cpw(cfv(cr1, cv(s0))))), wcel(c0, cdm(cr1)))
  eleq2i(c0, cdm(cr1), con0)
  ax-mp(wceq(cdm(cr1), con0), wfn(cr1, con0))
  r1fnon()
  fndm(cr1, con0)
  r1val1(s0, c0)
  iuneq2dv(s0, c0, cpw(cfv(cr1, cv(s0))), cpw(cab(s1, wcel(cfv(crnk, cv(s1)), cv(s0)))), wcel(c0, con0))
  pweqd(cfv(cr1, cv(s0)), cab(s1, wcel(cfv(crnk, cv(s1)), cv(s0))), wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(cfv(cr1, cv(s0)), cab(s1, wcel(cfv(crnk, cv(s1)), cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(s0), con0))
  onelon(c0, cv(s0))
  r1val2(s1, cv(s0))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, con0)
  diff.con0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm r1val3(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ On →(R1 ` c0)= ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, P({ s1 |(rank ` s1)∈ s0 })))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ∈ On →(R1 ` c0)= ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, P({ s1 |(rank ` s1)∈ s0 }))), d(s1, c0))
  eqtrd((R1 ` c0), ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, P({ s1 |(rank ` s1)∈ s0 })), ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, P((R1 ` s0))), c0 ∈ On)
  sylbir(c0 ∈ On, (R1 ` c0)= ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, P((R1 ` s0))), c0 ∈ dom(R1))
  eleq2i(c0, dom(R1), con0)
  ax-mp(dom(R1)= On, R1[Fn]On)
  r1fnon()
  fndm(cr1, con0)
  r1val1(s0, c0)
  iuneq2dv(s0, c0, P((R1 ` s0)), P({ s1 |(rank ` s1)∈ s0 }), c0 ∈ On)
  pweqd((R1 ` s0), { s1 |(rank ` s1)∈ s0 }, (c0 ∈ On ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  syl((c0 ∈ On ∧ s0 ∈ c0), (R1 ` s0)= { s1 |(rank ` s1)∈ s0 }, s0 ∈ On)
  onelon(c0, s0)
  r1val2(s1, s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, con0)
  diff.con0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: rankel
blocks.content: The membership relation is inherited by the rank function. Proposition 9.16 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 79. (Contributed by NM, 4-Oct-2003.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 17-Nov-2014.)

blocks.name: rankval3
blocks.content: The value of the rank function expressed recursively: the rank of a set is the smallest ordinal number containing the ranks of all members of the set. Proposition 9.17 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 79. (Contributed by NM, 11-Oct-2003.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 17-Nov-2014.)

blocks.name: bndrank
blocks.content: Any class whose elements have bounded rank is a set. Proposition 9.19 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 80. (Contributed by NM, 13-Oct-2003.)
blocks.origin:
thm bndrank(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wi(wrex(s0, con0, wral(s1, c0, wss(cfv(crnk, cv(s1)), cv(s0)))), wcel(c0, universe))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  rexlimiv(s0, con0, wral(s1, c0, wss(cfv(crnk, cv(s1)), cv(s0))), wcel(c0, universe))
  syl6(wcel(cv(s0), con0), wral(s1, c0, wss(cfv(crnk, cv(s1)), cv(s0))), wcel(c0, universe), wral(s1, c0, wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(s0))))))
  ralimdv(s1, c0, wcel(cv(s0), con0), wss(cfv(crnk, cv(s1)), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(s0)))))
  syl6mpi(wcel(cv(s0), con0), wss(cfv(crnk, cv(s1)), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(s0)))), wss(cfv(cr1, csuc(cfv(crnk, cv(s1)))), cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cr1, csuc(cfv(crnk, cv(s1))))))
  sylbid(wcel(cv(s0), con0), wss(cfv(crnk, cv(s1)), cv(s0)), wss(cfv(cr1, csuc(cfv(crnk, cv(s1)))), cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(s0)))), wss(csuc(cfv(crnk, cv(s1))), csuc(cv(s0))))
  sylancr(wcel(cv(s0), con0), wb(wss(cfv(crnk, cv(s1)), cv(s0)), wss(csuc(cfv(crnk, cv(s1))), csuc(cv(s0)))), word(cfv(crnk, cv(s1))), word(cv(s0)))
  onordi(cfv(crnk, cv(s1)))
  eloni(cv(s0))
  ordsucsssuc(cfv(crnk, cv(s1)), cv(s0))
  sylancr(wcel(cv(s0), con0), wi(wss(csuc(cfv(crnk, cv(s1))), csuc(cv(s0))), wss(cfv(cr1, csuc(cfv(crnk, cv(s1)))), cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(s0))))), wcel(csuc(cfv(crnk, cv(s1))), con0), wcel(csuc(cv(s0)), con0))
  onsuci(cfv(crnk, cv(s1)))

  sylbir(wral(s1, c0, wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(s0))))), wcel(c0, universe), wss(c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(s0)))))

thm bndrank(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  ⊢ (∃(s0 ∈ On, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(rank ` s1)⊆ s0))→ c0 ∈ 𝕌)

  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  rexlimiv(s0, con0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(rank ` s1)⊆ s0), c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  syl6(s0 ∈ On, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(rank ` s1)⊆ s0), c0 ∈ 𝕌, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, s1 ∈(R1 ` suc(s0))))
  ralimdv(s1, c0, s0 ∈ On, (rank ` s1)⊆ s0, s1 ∈(R1 ` suc(s0)))
  syl6mpi(s0 ∈ On, (rank ` s1)⊆ s0, s1 ∈(R1 ` suc(s0)), (R1 ` suc((rank ` s1)))⊆(R1 ` suc(s0)), s1 ∈(R1 ` suc((rank ` s1))))
  sylbid(s0 ∈ On, (rank ` s1)⊆ s0, (R1 ` suc((rank ` s1)))⊆(R1 ` suc(s0)), suc((rank ` s1))⊆ suc(s0))
  sylancr(s0 ∈ On, ((rank ` s1)⊆ s0 ↔ suc((rank ` s1))⊆ suc(s0)), Ord((rank ` s1)), Ord(s0))
  onordi((rank ` s1))
  eloni(s0)
  ordsucsssuc((rank ` s1), s0)
  sylancr(s0 ∈ On, (suc((rank ` s1))⊆ suc(s0)→(R1 ` suc((rank ` s1)))⊆(R1 ` suc(s0))), suc((rank ` s1))∈ On, suc(s0)∈ On)
  onsuci((rank ` s1))
  rankon(s1)
  suceloni(s0)
  r1ord3(suc((rank ` s1)), suc(s0))
  rankid(s1)
  vex(s1)
  ssel((R1 ` suc((rank ` s1))), (R1 ` suc(s0)), s1)
  sylbir(∀(s1 ∈ c0, s1 ∈(R1 ` suc(s0))), c0 ∈ 𝕌, c0 ⊆(R1 ` suc(s0)))
  dfss3(s1, c0, (R1 ` suc(s0)))
  ssex(c0, (R1 ` suc(s0)))
  fvex(cr1, suc(s0))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, universe)

blocks.origin:
thm unbndrank(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wi(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wral(s0, con0, wrex(s1, c0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(crnk, cv(s1))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)

} = {
  con1i(wcel(c0, universe), wral(s0, con0, wrex(s1, c0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(crnk, cv(s1))))))
  sylbir(wn(wral(s0, con0, wrex(s1, c0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(crnk, cv(s1)))))), wcel(c0, universe), wrex(s0, con0, wral(s1, c0, wss(cfv(crnk, cv(s1)), cv(s0)))))
  bitri(wrex(s0, con0, wral(s1, c0, wss(cfv(crnk, cv(s1)), cv(s0)))), wn(wral(s0, con0, wrex(s1, c0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(crnk, cv(s1)))))), wrex(s0, con0, wn(wrex(s1, c0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(crnk, cv(s1)))))))
  rexbiia(s0, con0, wral(s1, c0, wss(cfv(crnk, cv(s1)), cv(s0))), wn(wrex(s1, c0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(crnk, cv(s1))))))
  syl6bb(wcel(cv(s0), con0), wral(s1, c0, wss(cfv(crnk, cv(s1)), cv(s0))), wn(wrex(s1, c0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(crnk, cv(s1))))), wral(s1, c0, wn(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(crnk, cv(s1))))))
  ralbidv(s1, c0, wcel(cv(s0), con0), wss(cfv(crnk, cv(s1)), cv(s0)), wn(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(crnk, cv(s1)))))
  mpan(wcel(cv(s0), con0), wb(wss(cfv(crnk, cv(s1)), cv(s0)), wn(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(crnk, cv(s1))))), wcel(cfv(crnk, cv(s1)), con0))
  rankon(cv(s1))
  ontri1(cfv(crnk, cv(s1)), cv(s0))
  ralnex(s1, c0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(crnk, cv(s1))))
  rexnal(s0, con0, wrex(s1, c0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(crnk, cv(s1)))))
  bndrank(s0, s1, c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), con0)

  diff.con0.s(s1)

blocks.name: rankpw
blocks.content: The rank of a power set. Part of Exercise 30 of [Enderton] p. 207. (Contributed by NM, 22-Nov-2003.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 17-Nov-2014.)

blocks.name: ranklim
blocks.content: The rank of a set belongs to a limit ordinal iff the rank of its power set does. (Contributed by NM, 18-Sep-2006.)
blocks.origin:
thm ranklim(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wlim(c0), wb(wcel(cfv(crnk, c1), c0), wcel(cfv(crnk, cpw(c1)), c0)))
} = {
  pm2.61ian(wlim(c0), wb(wcel(cfv(crnk, c1), c0), wcel(cfv(crnk, cpw(c1)), c0)), wcel(c1, universe))
  bitr4d(wa(wcel(c1, universe), wlim(c0)), wcel(cfv(crnk, c1), c0), wcel(cfv(crnk, cpw(c1)), c0), wcel(csuc(cfv(crnk, c1)), c0))
  adantl(wcel(c1, universe), wlim(c0), wb(wcel(cfv(crnk, c1), c0), wcel(csuc(cfv(crnk, c1)), c0)))
  limsuc(c0, cfv(crnk, c1))
  adantr(wcel(c1, universe), wlim(c0), wb(wcel(cfv(crnk, cpw(c1)), c0), wcel(csuc(cfv(crnk, c1)), c0)))
  eleq1d(cfv(crnk, cpw(c1)), c0, csuc(cfv(crnk, c1)), wcel(c1, universe))
  vtoclg(hs0, c1, universe, wceq(cfv(crnk, cpw(c1)), csuc(cfv(crnk, c1))), wceq(cfv(crnk, cpw(cv(hs0))), csuc(cfv(crnk, cv(hs0)))))
  eqeq12d(cfv(crnk, cpw(cv(hs0))), csuc(cfv(crnk, cv(hs0))), cfv(crnk, cpw(c1)), csuc(cfv(crnk, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  fveq2d(crnk, cpw(cv(hs0)), cpw(c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  pweq(cv(hs0), c1)
  syl(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(csuc(cfv(crnk, cv(hs0))), csuc(cfv(crnk, c1))), wceq(cfv(crnk, cv(hs0)), cfv(crnk, c1)))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c1, crnk)
  suceq(cfv(crnk, cv(hs0)), cfv(crnk, c1))
  rankpw(cv(hs0))
  vex(hs0)
  adantr(wn(wcel(c1, universe)), wlim(c0), wb(wcel(cfv(crnk, c1), c0), wcel(cfv(crnk, cpw(c1)), c0)))
  eleq1d(cfv(crnk, c1), c0, cfv(crnk, cpw(c1)), wn(wcel(c1, universe)))
  eqtr4d(cfv(crnk, c1), cfv(crnk, cpw(c1)), emptycls, wn(wcel(c1, universe)))
  fvprc(c1, crnk)
  sylnbi(wcel(c1, universe), wceq(cfv(crnk, cpw(c1)), emptycls), wcel(cpw(c1), universe))
  pwexb(c1)
  fvprc(cpw(c1), crnk)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cfv(crnk, cpw(c1)), csuc(cfv(crnk, c1))))
}

thm ranklim(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (Lim(c0)→((rank ` c1)∈ c0 ↔(rank ` P(c1))∈ c0))
} = {
  pm2.61ian(Lim(c0), ((rank ` c1)∈ c0 ↔(rank ` P(c1))∈ c0), c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  bitr4d((c1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ Lim(c0)), (rank ` c1)∈ c0, (rank ` P(c1))∈ c0, suc((rank ` c1))∈ c0)
  adantl(c1 ∈ 𝕌, Lim(c0), ((rank ` c1)∈ c0 ↔ suc((rank ` c1))∈ c0))
  limsuc(c0, (rank ` c1))
  adantr(c1 ∈ 𝕌, Lim(c0), ((rank ` P(c1))∈ c0 ↔ suc((rank ` c1))∈ c0))
  eleq1d((rank ` P(c1)), c0, suc((rank ` c1)), c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  vtoclg(hs0, c1, universe, (rank ` P(c1))= suc((rank ` c1)), (rank ` P(hs0))= suc((rank ` hs0)))
  eqeq12d((rank ` P(hs0)), suc((rank ` hs0)), (rank ` P(c1)), suc((rank ` c1)), hs0 = c1)
  fveq2d(crnk, P(hs0), P(c1), hs0 = c1)
  pweq(hs0, c1)
  syl(hs0 = c1, suc((rank ` hs0))= suc((rank ` c1)), (rank ` hs0)=(rank ` c1))
  fveq2(hs0, c1, crnk)
  suceq((rank ` hs0), (rank ` c1))
  rankpw(hs0)
  vex(hs0)
  adantr(¬ c1 ∈ 𝕌, Lim(c0), ((rank ` c1)∈ c0 ↔(rank ` P(c1))∈ c0))
  eleq1d((rank ` c1), c0, (rank ` P(c1)), ¬ c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  eqtr4d((rank ` c1), (rank ` P(c1)), emptycls, ¬ c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  fvprc(c1, crnk)
  sylnbi(c1 ∈ 𝕌, (rank ` P(c1))= ∅, P(c1)∈ 𝕌)
  pwexb(c1)
  fvprc(P(c1), crnk)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w((rank ` P(c1))= suc((rank ` c1)))
}

blocks.name: r1pw
blocks.content: A stronger property of ` R1 ` than ~ rankpw . The latter merely proves that ` R1 ` of the successor is a power set, but here we prove that if ` A ` is in the cumulative hierarchy, then ` ~P A ` is in the cumulative hierarchy of the successor. (Contributed by Raph Levien, 29-May-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 17-Nov-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm r1pw(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, con0), wb(wcel(c1, cfv(cr1, c0)), wcel(cpw(c1), cfv(cr1, csuc(c0)))))
} = {
  pm2.61i(wi(wcel(c0, con0), wb(wcel(c1, cfv(cr1, c0)), wcel(cpw(c1), cfv(cr1, csuc(c0))))), wcel(c1, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))))
  ex(wcel(c1, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wcel(c0, con0), wb(wcel(c1, cfv(cr1, c0)), wcel(cpw(c1), cfv(cr1, csuc(c0)))))
  3bitr4rd(wa(wcel(c1, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wcel(c0, con0)), wcel(c1, cfv(cr1, c0)), wcel(cpw(c1), cfv(cr1, csuc(c0))), wcel(cfv(crnk, cpw(c1)), csuc(c0)), wcel(cfv(crnk, c1), c0))
  sylan9bb(wcel(c1, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wcel(c0, con0), wcel(cfv(crnk, cpw(c1)), csuc(c0)), wcel(cfv(crnk, c1), c0), wcel(csuc(cfv(crnk, c1)), csuc(c0)))
  eleq1d(cfv(crnk, cpw(c1)), csuc(c0), csuc(cfv(crnk, c1)), wcel(c1, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))))
  rankpwi(c1)
  bicomd(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(csuc(cfv(crnk, c1)), csuc(c0)), wcel(cfv(crnk, c1), c0))
  syl(wcel(c0, con0), wb(wcel(cfv(crnk, c1), c0), wcel(csuc(cfv(crnk, c1)), csuc(c0))), word(c0))
  eloni(c0)
  ordsucelsuc(c0, cfv(crnk, c1))
  syl2an(wcel(c1, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wcel(c0, con0), wb(wcel(cpw(c1), cfv(cr1, csuc(c0))), wcel(cfv(crnk, cpw(c1)), csuc(c0))), wcel(cpw(c1), cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wcel(csuc(c0), cdm(cr1)))
  biimpi(wcel(c1, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wcel(cpw(c1), cuni(cima(cr1, con0))))
  pwwf(c1)
  syl6eleqr(csuc(c0), cdm(cr1), con0, wcel(c0, con0))
  suceloni(c0)
  rankr1ag(cpw(c1), csuc(c0))
  sylan2br(wcel(c1, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wcel(c0, con0), wb(wcel(c1, cfv(cr1, c0)), wcel(cfv(crnk, c1), c0)), wcel(c0, cdm(cr1)))
  eleq2i(c0, cdm(cr1), con0)
  ax-mp(wceq(cdm(cr1), con0), wfn(cr1, con0))
  r1fnon()
  fndm(cr1, con0)
  rankr1ag(c1, c0)
  a1d(wn(wcel(c1, cuni(cima(cr1, con0)))), wcel(c0, con0), wb(wcel(c1, cfv(cr1, c0)), wcel(cpw(c1), cfv(cr1, csuc(c0)))))
  pm5.21ni(wcel(c1, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wcel(c1, cfv(cr1, c0)), wcel(cpw(c1), cfv(cr1, csuc(c0))))
  r1elwf(c1, c0)
  sseldd(c1, cuni(cima(cr1, con0)), cpw(c1), wcel(cpw(c1), cfv(cr1, csuc(c0))))
  syl(wcel(cpw(c1), cfv(cr1, csuc(c0))), wss(cpw(c1), cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wcel(cpw(c1), cuni(cima(cr1, con0))))
  r1elwf(cpw(c1), csuc(c0))
  r1elssi(cpw(c1))
  mpbiri(wcel(cpw(c1), cfv(cr1, csuc(c0))), wcel(c1, cpw(c1)), wss(c1, c1))
  ssid(c1)
  syl(wcel(cpw(c1), cfv(cr1, csuc(c0))), wb(wcel(c1, cpw(c1)), wss(c1, c1)), wcel(c1, universe))
  pwexr(c1, cfv(cr1, csuc(c0)))
  elpwg(c1, universe, c1)
}

thm r1pw(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ On →(c1 ∈(R1 ` c0)↔ P(c1)∈(R1 ` suc(c0))))
} = {
  pm2.61i((c0 ∈ On →(c1 ∈(R1 ` c0)↔ P(c1)∈(R1 ` suc(c0)))), c1 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On))
  ex(c1 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On), c0 ∈ On, (c1 ∈(R1 ` c0)↔ P(c1)∈(R1 ` suc(c0))))
  3bitr4rd((c1 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On)∧ c0 ∈ On), c1 ∈(R1 ` c0), P(c1)∈(R1 ` suc(c0)), (rank ` P(c1))∈ suc(c0), (rank ` c1)∈ c0)
  sylan9bb(c1 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On), c0 ∈ On, (rank ` P(c1))∈ suc(c0), (rank ` c1)∈ c0, suc((rank ` c1))∈ suc(c0))
  eleq1d((rank ` P(c1)), suc(c0), suc((rank ` c1)), c1 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On))
  rankpwi(c1)
  bicomd(c0 ∈ On, suc((rank ` c1))∈ suc(c0), (rank ` c1)∈ c0)
  syl(c0 ∈ On, ((rank ` c1)∈ c0 ↔ suc((rank ` c1))∈ suc(c0)), Ord(c0))
  eloni(c0)
  ordsucelsuc(c0, (rank ` c1))
  syl2an(c1 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On), c0 ∈ On, (P(c1)∈(R1 ` suc(c0))↔(rank ` P(c1))∈ suc(c0)), P(c1)∈ ⋃(R1 " On), suc(c0)∈ dom(R1))
  biimpi(c1 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On), P(c1)∈ ⋃(R1 " On))
  pwwf(c1)
  syl6eleqr(suc(c0), dom(R1), con0, c0 ∈ On)
  suceloni(c0)
  rankr1ag(P(c1), suc(c0))
  sylan2br(c1 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On), c0 ∈ On, (c1 ∈(R1 ` c0)↔(rank ` c1)∈ c0), c0 ∈ dom(R1))
  eleq2i(c0, dom(R1), con0)
  ax-mp(dom(R1)= On, R1[Fn]On)
  r1fnon()
  fndm(cr1, con0)
  rankr1ag(c1, c0)
  a1d(¬ c1 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On), c0 ∈ On, (c1 ∈(R1 ` c0)↔ P(c1)∈(R1 ` suc(c0))))
  pm5.21ni(c1 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On), c1 ∈(R1 ` c0), P(c1)∈(R1 ` suc(c0)))
  r1elwf(c1, c0)
  sseldd(c1, ⋃(R1 " On), P(c1), P(c1)∈(R1 ` suc(c0)))
  syl(P(c1)∈(R1 ` suc(c0)), P(c1)⊆ ⋃(R1 " On), P(c1)∈ ⋃(R1 " On))
  r1elwf(P(c1), suc(c0))
  r1elssi(P(c1))
  mpbiri(P(c1)∈(R1 ` suc(c0)), c1 ∈ P(c1), c1 ⊆ c1)
  ssid(c1)
  syl(P(c1)∈(R1 ` suc(c0)), (c1 ∈ P(c1)↔ c1 ⊆ c1), c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  pwexr(c1, (R1 ` suc(c0)))
  elpwg(c1, universe, c1)
}

blocks.name: r1pwALT
blocks.content: Alternate shorter proof of ~ r1pw based on the additional axioms ~ ax-reg and ~ ax-inf2 . (Contributed by Raph Levien, 29-May-2004.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm r1pwALT(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, con0), wb(wcel(c1, cfv(cr1, c0)), wcel(cpw(c1), cfv(cr1, csuc(c0)))))
} = {
  pm2.61i(wi(wcel(c0, con0), wb(wcel(c1, cfv(cr1, c0)), wcel(cpw(c1), cfv(cr1, csuc(c0))))), wcel(c1, universe))
  vtoclg(hs0, c1, universe, wi(wcel(c0, con0), wb(wcel(c1, cfv(cr1, c0)), wcel(cpw(c1), cfv(cr1, csuc(c0))))), wi(wcel(c0, con0), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cr1, c0)), wcel(cpw(cv(hs0)), cfv(cr1, csuc(c0))))))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(c0, con0), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cr1, c0)), wcel(cpw(cv(hs0)), cfv(cr1, csuc(c0)))), wb(wcel(c1, cfv(cr1, c0)), wcel(cpw(c1), cfv(cr1, csuc(c0)))))
  bibi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cr1, c0)), wcel(cpw(cv(hs0)), cfv(cr1, csuc(c0))), wcel(c1, cfv(cr1, c0)), wcel(cpw(c1), cfv(cr1, csuc(c0))))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), c1, cfv(cr1, c0))
  eleq1d(cpw(cv(hs0)), cfv(cr1, csuc(c0)), cpw(c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  pweq(cv(hs0), c1)
  bitr4d(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cr1, c0)), wcel(cpw(cv(hs0)), cfv(cr1, csuc(c0))), wcel(cfv(crnk, cpw(cv(hs0))), csuc(c0)))
  syl6bbr(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cr1, c0)), wcel(cfv(crnk, cpw(cv(hs0))), csuc(c0)), wcel(csuc(cfv(crnk, cv(hs0))), csuc(c0)))
  bitrd(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cr1, c0)), wcel(csuc(cfv(crnk, cv(hs0))), csuc(c0)), wcel(cfv(crnk, cv(hs0)), c0))
  rankr1a(c0, cv(hs0))
  syl(wcel(c0, con0), wb(wcel(cfv(crnk, cv(hs0)), c0), wcel(csuc(cfv(crnk, cv(hs0))), csuc(c0))), word(c0))
  eloni(c0)
  ordsucelsuc(c0, cfv(crnk, cv(hs0)))
  eleq1i(cfv(crnk, cpw(cv(hs0))), csuc(c0), csuc(cfv(crnk, cv(hs0))))
  rankpw(cv(hs0))
  syl(wcel(c0, con0), wb(wcel(cpw(cv(hs0)), cfv(cr1, csuc(c0))), wcel(cfv(crnk, cpw(cv(hs0))), csuc(c0))), wcel(csuc(c0), con0))
  suceloni(c0)
  rankr1a(csuc(c0), cpw(cv(hs0)))
  pwex(cv(hs0))
  vex(hs0)
  a1d(wn(wcel(c1, universe)), wcel(c0, con0), wb(wcel(c1, cfv(cr1, c0)), wcel(cpw(c1), cfv(cr1, csuc(c0)))))
  pm5.21ni(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c1, cfv(cr1, c0)), wcel(cpw(c1), cfv(cr1, csuc(c0))))
  elex(c1, cfv(cr1, c0))
  sylibr(wcel(cpw(c1), cfv(cr1, csuc(c0))), wcel(c1, universe), wcel(cpw(c1), universe))
  elex(cpw(c1), cfv(cr1, csuc(c0)))
  pwexb(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wcel(c0, con0), wb(wcel(c1, cfv(cr1, c0)), wcel(cpw(c1), cfv(cr1, csuc(c0))))))
}
